Thursday night is all about getting your asses on the floor, so welcome to "The Club" our night of the best dance music of all time!! We know some of you love your EDM so we're gonna funk up songs by Disclosure, Bassment Jaxx, Depeche Mode and others and mash them up with the greatest dance hits of every decade of the past century by artists such as Missy Elliot, Janet Jackson, Outkast, Benny Goodman, Calvin Harris and more! Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!

description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Wednesday night, come get higher as we present "Vinyl", a night of Funk, Soul, R&B, and Rock. We're raiding your record collection and dusting off songs by Tower of Power, GAP Band, Parliament Funkadelic, Chicago, Michael Jackson, Stevie Wonder, Chaka Khan, Aretha Franklin, The Rolling Stones, Motown and others! Before the show come enjoy our friendly bar and just hang out with the sexiest folks ever!  Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!

description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Keep your peepers peeled for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which indicate you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge while enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
name: Daily Snow Cones at Paradise Motel
print_description: Enjoy a snow cone and music while lounging in our shade. Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice welcomed. Remember, if you show your junk, cut to the front!
title: Daily Snow Cones at Paradise Motel

description:
movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism.
 a hands-on, physical experience of the ritual celebration.  The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit. Then it moves you into a deeper state of consciousness and closer to your individual and collective soul’s purpose. Utilizing dance, contemporary shamanism, hands on healing, drumming and global music, this powerful and beautiful soul work sheds inhibitions and heightens inner awareness in a safe and carefully monitored group setting. Dancers are blindfolded in the shamanic tradition and step beyond their conscious fears and limitations and allow their innermost creative sides to break free. Dancers tune in to sound and movement to take an inner journey exploring a trance-like state of self-discovery and self-realization.
name: Dance of Liberation
print_description: movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism
title: Dance of Liberation

This years workshops will feature: Sacred Yoga Dance, Brazilian Samba, Belly Dancing, and Afro Brazilian.  So get your groove on…always before Noon.

description: A moving prayer space for people who want MORE LIFE. We dance an alchemical wave of the elements in sacred community as a way of inner and outer connection, deep transformation, and a great deal of FUN! Accessible to ALL. Come dance the sweet, authentic, hungry truth birthing in every breath of your beautiful human life. Dance your gratitude, your pain, your joy, and the beyond imaginable awesomeness of your deepest desires. Give it up! Sweaty prayers liberate our lives. Let your body make your prayer.

description: Heaven on earth is available the moment you become fully resident in your body, on the earth.  The biggest, most life-y life is waiting for you right here, just on the other side of your armors and clever designs.  Join Dancing Freedom founder, Samantha Sweetwater, for an sublime movement journey to shake things up, free your body, mind and spirit and give wings and roots to your soul's design.

description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation. Contact: srodenburg@gmail.com
name: Dark Sparkle Burlesque Extravaganza
print_description: An exploration through performance, storytelling, and tease, featuring DS performers and guests from the BRC. Come ready to participate!

description:
We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING BLINKIES TO GIVE AWAY (I order 200 extra for my hunting adventures). Hunting party goes out at 8 pm. Join us at 9 pm to share your victories. My record so far is 50 darktards and 2 unlit police officers. 
Our prey are invited to become next year's hunters (asked to bring extra blinkies to give away next year). A true Darktard Hunter cannot help but hunt their prey throughout the event. 
Darktards are dangerous to themselves and others and MUST SEE THE LIGHT!
(Do not ask for handouts, this is a 'bring your own blinky' event)
name: Darktard Hunting
other_location: Meet at green ATV sortof near front of Planet Earth (4:30 and Esplanade). Ask for Leslie.
print_description: We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING LIGHTS TO GIVE AWAY. (Don't ask for handouts='bring your own blinky' event)

description: Talk by Ben Burningham, an astronomer with a penchant for remote sensing the atmospheres of brown dwarfs and giant planets. His talk will be about the difficulty of defining a planet which is directly related to his research and close to his heart. Discussion may lead into the mind boggling diversity of extra solar planets we’ve become aware of in the last decade.
name: Defining a Planet
print_description: An astronomer describes what makes a planet and how we define the term planet with the incredible diversity discovered in recent years.
title: Defining a Planet

description:
an investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture. 
How do we Identify with where we are? In a globalized world it becomes easy to view the beauty and Majesty of a place as an observer. This workshop will give you tools to develop a "sense a place" through pattern identification to be present in mind, body, spirit and location. To understand and view the world as a series of patterns that apply anywhere is to unlock the language of the natural world. Discussion led by Jesse Hernreich
name: Developing "Sense of Place"
print_description: an investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture. Discussion led by Jesse Hernreich
title: Developing "Sense of Place"

description: Devi Flow is a strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements (mudra-asana-prana-bhakti dance) set to undulating world rhythms and the sounds of the ocean. Devi Flow is a power class that strengthens the core, uplifts the spirit, calms and focuses the restless mind.  Devi Flow is an evolution of intentional movement and yoga blended soulfully to ignite the warrior spirit. Using simple mudras, heart opening dynamic movement and a traditional vinyasa flow, Devi Flow awakens the inner warrior/goddess within all Yogi’s - while receiving therapeutic benefits from the practice. Together we will explore as a collective and express as individuals, creating harmony with breath, beauty with movement; all to the sacred heartbeat within unique original music and the sounds of nature.
name: Devi Flow Yoga w/ Juju Namjai
print_description: A strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements to uplift the spirit, calm and focus the restless mind.
title: Devi Flow Yoga w/ Juju Namjai

description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game (or regular frisbee, depending on the mood). Bare your body, but wear lights! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) This is our only night event, but don't worry about cold – movement will keep you warm!
name: Discus-ish Throw in the dark... and in the buff
print_description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game. Bare your body, but wear lights!

description: Join entrepreneur and activist John Gilmore for a lively discussion ranging from freedom in cyberspace to drug policy reform. John Gilmore was the 5th employee of Sun Microsystems, the co-founder of the Electronic Freedom Foundation (EFF) and Cygnus Solutions, and he serves as a member of the board of directors for the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies and the Marijuana Policy Project.

description: Come participate in a sacred womens circle. Join together with your sisters as we explore the theme of violence against women and how to heal from trauma, find our voices and unite in our power. This particular focus is on recovering from violence and understanding the oppression of the feminine in this age. And by understanding that past we can more consciously choose our future as empowered goddesses. This class integrates group and partner activities, reflections and sharing, learning and movement, indigenous spiritual wisdom to help heal women.
name: Divine Feminine Empowerment
print_description: Come participate in a sacred womens circle. Join together with your sisters as we explore the theme of violence against women & how to heal frm trauma
title: Divine Feminine Empowerment

description:
If you have seen Fury Road you know who the Doof Warrior is. We figured the Neverwas Haul needs to represent.  We have built a awesome playable guitar inspired by the movie, a small amp will be provided for you to tear off a few riffs.
 Feel free to bring a band if you have one. We will have a photographer and we will also have a elevated location for you to take pictures of your friends from. 
 Photos will be posted on Flickr under "Neverwas Doof Off". I a suitable # of Mad Max themed vehicles show up we may do a "chase" out onto the playa afterwards.
Hand made Bandannas for the first 25 Doof Warriors!
name: DOOF OFF on Neverwas Hall ,awesome guitar provided
print_description:
Pose on Neverwas Haul with our custom DOOF guitar!
Fri 6:00 PM @2:30 and Fury (F) Photos will be taken and posted.
Swag for best costumes "WITNESS!"
title: DOOF OFF on Neverwas Hall ,awesome guitar provided

description:
Everybody loves to sue everybody else in the good old U.S. of A!  So we here at Camp Dusty Justice are celebrating that practice and bringing an open, slightly impartial, fun venue for Burners of all stripes to get their dusty dirty day in court.  

Bring your case!  You will be heard!  Is it your noisy neighbor? (we had one!)  Did your best childhood friend make out with your girlfriend? (a real issue from last year)  Did a campmate drink your last cold beer?  Maybe it was just your turn to drive the art car.  Whatever the dispute, our jurist will sort it out.

We will hold court three times during the week or if an emergency arises.  Join us Monday afternoon, Wednesday afternoon and Friday afternoon from 4:30-6:30 for fun, laughs, and some serious judgments and some wicked punishments.
name: Dusty Justice Court
print_description: Dusty Justice Court
title: Dusty Justice Court

description: Git on over to the Dusty Poon Saloon for a gun slingin' good time! Park your pony, check your pistol at the door, and belly up to the bar for one of our signature Poon-Tang libations! Come dressed in your best Western gear or get gussied up in what we provide and we'll shoot your photograph, but hopefully not you! You’re bound to have a shit kickin' good time here with dancin', drinkin', photo taking, and patent pending body buffing station and hell, maybe even a wild western showdown! And don’t forget to Download your pictures after the burn on our Facebook page.
name: Dusty Poon @ Noon - Get Wobbly on Wednesday
print_description: Check your pistol at the door, and belly up to the bar for our signature Poon-Tang libations! We'll shoot you in our Wild Western Photo Booth!
title: Dusty Poon @ Noon - Get Wobbly on Wednesday

description:
Experience the ecstasy and joy of dancing and singing together to the beat of live drums! Come and express your inner village.
Malaika MaVeena brings a wealth of Earth Wisdom for personal and Planetary awakening having walked the Shamanic Path for a lifetime. She has over 25 years as a Global Movement facilitator and is the founder of 5Elements Dance Activation™- a powerful ecstatic dance meditation taking groups deep into the core of their soul, and transforming negativity into nectar! These expression sessions are Spirituality rooted in the body! Malaika is a qualified ISHTA yoga teacher, Water Dance practitioner, African Dancer and performer, speaker, Lomi Lomi practitioner, musician, and DJ -true Earth Goddess
name: Dynamic African Dance- Malaika MaVeena
print_description: Experience the ecstasy and joy of dancing and singing together to the beat of live drums! Come and express your inner village!
title: Dynamic African Dance- Malaika MaVeena

description: The playa under our feet seems featureless, but this vast lake bed is a dynamic, complex environment. This technique, based on teachings from a guru in Bali, raises the kundalini energy, raises our vibration, raises our consciousness. It is the place that orgasm becomes prayer and we can expand to touch the universe.

description: Practice the ability to let your voice express the euphoric energy that is surging through your body as you revel and party on the playa! Exploring the full range of sounds possible with the human voice, we will make Primal calls, Animal sounds, Celebratory shouts, Chanting, and Sounding into the Body- with the perspective that all sounds and vocal qualities are acceptable and worth being heard. (1.5 hr workshop)

description:
Puma will share how to express your emotions with "I statements", so that you can let your camp mates know how you feel without starting World War III. A simple extension will add how to set boundaries so that other people know when they are crossing over one of your comfort barriers.

"It's your responsibility to let other people know how you feel when they're stepping on your toes" - Rosalyn Bruyere
name: Effective Communication of Emotions and Boundaries
print_description: Simple technique of how to express your emotions without making other people responsible - a great model for how to deal with issues past & present.
title: Effective Communication of Emotions and Boundaries

description:
Are you in your body? Is your inner sexy, free to play, to explore, and to find expression? Gabriella and Alex will help you unlock the authentic expression of your sexuality. Become present to desire, aware of sensation, and connected to your own sexual rhythm, with just 90 minutes of simple meditation, breathing, and yoga practices. 

If you are thinking about being sexual as part of your Burn, why not start by tapping in to the most authentic expression of your sexuality possible. Pleasure, connection, love, and joy, are all possible, but you will likely need to move through layer upon layer of story and conditioning to access that. Breath, meditation, and yoga are some of the keys to unlocking the vast treasure that is your sexuality, and in this morning session you will be shown the way.

This session is highly recommended for women and for couples, however, no one will be turned away.

Alex is a full-time yoga teacher in Venice, California. She is a surfer and a total love. Gabriella is a tantric teacher/sex-positive ambassador/and event organizer, who spends her time between Portland and Malibu.
name: Embody Your Sexuality: Yoga and Meditation
print_description: Are you embodying your authentic sexual self? Are you connected to that part of you that longs to be desired and desires. Get your sexy on, yoga!
title: Embody Your Sexuality: Yoga and Meditation

description:
Thanx to YoMama Care, the Playa now has an alternative to the western medicine practiced in those "med" tents. The "Emerge-n-See In-Tents-IV Care Unit" (or just "ICU" for short) is here for all your health dare needs.
ICU is staffed for all sorts of procedures from Beerthing to Sexy Change Operations. And of course, all our staff is certified in CPR (Cocktail Party Resuscitation).
But wait, that's not all !!! ICU offers a 200% money back guarantee !

Are you a certified Moctor or Curse?
ICU presently has openings for those who want to play doctor.
Please contact Doc Holiday via the listed email address.
name: EmergeInSee InTentsIV Care Unit (ICU)

description: Back by popular demand, Enchanted Handjobs. Hand massage and tête-à-tête with camp ShangriLa are scheduled Sunday, Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 2-3pm. Discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Coconut oil is used to lubricate and soften the hands while our mystic healers work away your troubles and cares using a combination of techniques along with the right amount of pressure. Last year over 100 attended and we had people literally purring in our hands. Stop by and explore this amazing treat for yourself at ShangriLa! You will receive and give a Handjob! The best free gift for you and your playa friends is a hand massage. Our hands do a lot of work from the minute we wake up until we go to bed. When was the last time you gave a loved one a gentle hand massage? It always surprises people when they discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Come and explore this amazing treat for yourself and others @ ShangriLa!
name: Enchanted Handjobs
print_description: Discover the delights of a hand massage. Coconut oil is used to lubricate and soften your hands. People are literally purring in our hands - a treat!
title: Enchanted Handjobs

description:
We are all yearning for more conscious touch. This workshop provides a safe container to explore at your pace, supported with guidance and uplifted by a tribe of others seeking the same.

We will set some group agreements regarding consent with clear boundaries. 

The techniques we will explore are Elemental, Tantric (non-sexual) and Multi-Handed, as time permits.

Bring a partner or find one in the space (not guaranteed!) - Clothing is optional as it suits comfort.

Bring a Towel

description:
Greetings mortals, welcome to the world of Grignr the mightiest of barbarians. Come and join us on the Silicon Village stage for a group reading of the funniest and most terrible pieces of fan fiction ever produced... 'The Eye of Argon." Bear witness to the near impossible to read dialogue without bursting into laughter as other readers and members of the audience act out the scenes from this story regardless of inconsistencies, spelling errors, grammar errors, capitalization errors, tense errors, and made up words that make no sense! Do you have the stomach for dialogue such as this?

"The vile stench of the Shaman's hot fetid breath over came the nauseated female with a deep soul searing sickness, causing her to wrench her head backwards and regurgitate a slimy, orange white stream of swelling gore over the richly woven purple robe of the enthused acolyte."

If so come to the reading of the "Eye of Argon" written 35 years ago and has yet to be forgotten in the sands of time. The dialogue may seem impossible, but the terrible show will go on!
name: Eye of Argon - Comedy Reading/Group Performance
print_description: Join us at Silicon Village stage for a group reading & acting out of the funniest & most terrible piece of fan fiction ever produced, The Eye of Argon
title: Eye of Argon - Comedy Reading/Group Performance

description: Most gay men struggle with father issues. These wounds often prevent gay men from being completely intimate, often feeling rejected, not good enough or abandoned. This ritual serves to transform those wounds into sources of strength and compassion, allowing participants to fully embrace themselves, live authentically and experience deep, committed intimate relationships with themselves and other men. Led by Coop.

description:
False Profit, Inc., sent shock waves through the stock market with its recent announcement of current plans for its annual Tuesday Night Party (TNP) at The Burning Man Arts and Culture Festival. In a move outside experts are hailing for its boldness and freshtasticness, False Profit, Inc., released news that it would be holding the event not at its desert research field campus proper, but “out in the open.”

“For 14 years, we’ve invited shareholders to our desert campus to celebrate with us,” said Jef Pearlman, Senior VP of Auditory Logistics. “This year, we decided to think ‘outside the camp.’”

Citing ever-increasing attendance, bicycle parking challenges, and the desire for attendees to experience high fidelity sound “en plein air” as forces pushing the party into the open playa, , a spokesperson for the company enthusiastically predicted that this year’s TNP would be “the best evar.”

Referring to the unanticipated relocation, an unnamed insider also hinted that the main research facility is so filled this year with mad science projects--which shareholders will undoubtedly wish to keep a watchful eye on as conditions evolve--that the decision to shift was “easy peasy”.

The party will be held on the open “playa” approximately 300 feet out from the company’s primary campus location of 5:15 and Esplanade. This location was chosen due to the giant deep sea fish that will be located there, which analysts expect will protect attendees from wandering shirtcockers, newbs, darkwads, those rich people who are destroying Burning Man, and other unsavory characters. Known as Illumacanth, the fish will delight and astound party attendees with its spikes, lights, and fire. Sound for the event will be provided by the legendary Dr. Brainlove, a project of The Phage, a long-time affiliate company and co-conspirator of False Profit.
name: False Profit's Tuesday Night Party
print_description: It's Tuesday.  Again.
title: False Profit's Tuesday Night Party

description:
What stops you from giving your gifts and following your true calling? Let's find out together in this experiential workshop. You'll uncover the voices, mindsets, and narratives that block you from taking risks and expanding to new levels. We'll also go over some common pitfalls (e.g., perfectionism) that prevent people from starting their most meaningful work today. 

// Maria Molfino is a women’s leadership coach who helps women gain the creative confidence to lead. With a Masters in Design from Stanford, she has worked with top managers and executives working at companies such as Facebook, Twitter, and IDEO. She has 10+ years experience empowering individuals to manage their stress, and has spent the last five years running leadership programs and social initiatives for women. She believes a woman’s creative ability is her greatest asset – the key to leading a deeply satisfying career and life.  When she isn’t coaching, she’s sipping on tea and writing poems in the redwoods.
name: Fear, Inner Critic, and Risk-Taking
print_description: What stops you from giving your gifts? Uncover the voices, mindsets, and narratives that block you from taking risks and expanding to new levels.
title: Fear, Inner Critic, and Risk-Taking

description:
Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains and find your inner alignment?  Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing.  It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as you are guided through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and peace.  Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.

A great way to rejuvenate your tired playa body!

Burners are invited to take refuge from the heat and decorate themselves with silver-and-gold flash tattoos that will last the entire week of the Burn. Kamp, established in 1999 using olive drab military surplus, will expand its noxious cloud to encompass a variety of interactive activities, workshops, gifting, and (f)art installations. Radio station K-F.A.R.T. at 107.3 FM will be broadcasting 24/7 its delightful, if somewhat tasteless transmissions, answering machine messages, and public service announcements.

Workshops include wig and dread fall making, pendant making, T-shirt slashing, SWAG necklace organizers, and more. Betty’s Booty Boutique clothing exchange will be open for business 24/7. Fart into a megaphone if the timing is right, or stop by and learn to tie a shemagh!

description:
Flirt Camp is a lush and sensual lounge space with music, benches, pillows, an alter and a bar. We have a nice backlit Flirt Camp sign on the front of our lounge space that brings folks in. Just park the bike in the provided bike rack and come on in!

Once at the bar, roll the Flirt Dice or have a spin of our Flirt Wheel to "break the ice" and enjoy a refreshing cocktail. Mingle in our well-shaded lounge with lots of sensual color and creature comforts.

The lounge area is open 24 hours a day. The bar area is open for most of the day while a camper is available. 
During the week, we hold guided meditations and yoga at the camp, a couple really cool dance parties and a flash-mob in our front yard.

The foundation of our interaction with the Burning Man community is a commitment to having amazing relationships and keeping the chemistry alive and hot.

xoxoxoxox
name: Flirt Camp Lounge & Bar with Flirty Games
print_description: Flirt Camp is a lush and sensual lounge space with music, benches, pillows, an alter and a bar.
title: Flirt Camp Lounge & Bar with Flirty Games

description:
For brief moments we will to make the desert bloom. On our giant table we will serve eatable flowers (candied, dried or pickled) and other very special tiny food suprises.
 The idea of the giant table refers of Gullivers travel to Brobdingnag - the country of the Giants. In contrast to the huge table set, we will serve tiny food suprises.
Food is one of most obvious things we enjoy or miss while travelling to foreign countries. To taste something unknown, you have to be open, brave and curious. Missing food from home makes us treasure, what we have in everyday life.
By serving very tiny suprises most people never tasted before, we want to create a very special, emotional and reflective moment for our guests.
name: Flowers in the Desert
print_description:
Flowers in the Desert
 
For brief moments we will to make the desert bloom. Be a guest at the Giants table and get a special taste of another world.
title: Flowers in the Desert

description:
Walking the human path while being able to fly at will throughout the higher realms is part of our natural design. From gazing mindlessly out through the window in elementary school classrooms, to blissful meditations, or exploring the universe via medicine journeys as adults, we need to be free to consciously travel out-of-body. We are residents of many dimensions. To function and contribute in the everyday frequencies, we need to be grounded but not limited. If we can achieve even a brief moment of higher consciousness we have the ability to recall the experience, regenerate it via appreciation, and reenter these same spiritual realities using creative imagination. This also means that we can dial our conscious awareness back down in order to focus on the physical world and appreciate its finer aspects. 
This is the life of the “householder” who visits the Mountain Temple of higher consciousness and brings its wondrous vibrations into the local village or city as a balanced human being. 

www.higherselfdiscovery.com
name: Flying High and Being Spiritually Grounded
print_description: Come by for some perspective after the Man Burn and before the Temple Burn...with Craig Junjulas
title: Flying High and Being Spiritually Grounded

description:
What makes a community visionary or transformational? What roles do these communities play in our lives? And how can we create models for sustainable growth in the digital age? 

In this talk Chris will explore the nature of visionary communities, both internal and external threats they face, and forward-looking strategies for their sustenance and growth. Chris will draw on his real-world experience organizing Palenque Norte and Psychedelic Society of San Francisco to highlight the opportunities and challenges ahead.
name: Fostering Healthy Visionary Community
print_description: In this talk Chris Pezza will discuss the nature of visionary communities and forward-looking strategies for their sustainable growth.
title: Fostering Healthy Visionary Community

description:
My camp, the Free Photography Zone, has been doing portraits of the participants of Burning Man continuously for the past 19 years.  Each person, or group, is photographed in a studio setting and given an instant print as their tangible reminder of their Burning Man experience.  I then photograph then on medium format black and white film so that, if they wish, they can get prints at a later date.

These are not a re-do of your high school yearbook portrait just in Burning Man attire.  I try to give each person enough time to help me make a lasting photograph.  On our gallery walls in our shade structure there are black and white prints ranging in size from 16x20" to 4x5' that I hope will be of some inspiration to you.  Though I try not to duplicate what I have done in the past they may serve as a jumping off point for our photography session.  Not the easiest thing given the approximately 47,000 black and white negatives done so far.  I have never counted and see no reason to start now.

I consider the people I photograph as the most important part of any photograph and always try my best to make a photograph that will be of lasting value and interest well beyond the moment of its creation.

Come, join me, and together we may make something wonderful.  

I usually begin each day about 10 or 11 AM and continue into the night till I can't keep on my feet any longer.  Weather permitting I'll begin on Sunday August 30th through Saturday September 5th.

I do look forward to photographing you.
name: Free Photography Zone, Portraits on the Playa
print_description: My 19th year making portraits of the participants.  Get your print and be photographed in a real studio setting.  Every day and night.
title: Free Photography Zone, Portraits on the Playa

description:
What is this? A carnival of dusty disco balls? We’re not just here to clown around—we make the playa safe from dust so that all of the citizens and rubes of Black Rock City can breathe freely. Rendezvous with us! Please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. 

You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
name: French Maid Brigade Parade
print_description: Who needs a carnival of dusty disco balls? Join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and your worst possible French accent.

description:
Gabriel Wolfchild is a nationally touring singer songwriter with an earnest heart that evokes the last of the Romantic Troubadors.  Sincerity is only a real as the fragile heart exposed…and Gabriel is in tune with this channel…taking us into time and space when we were submerged in love…as the reality of our existence. 
Gabriel will be performing at Reverbia's Concerts in the Shade Series on Wednesday at 2:15 and at Reverbia Jam and Chai on Friday/Saturday morning at 1am.  You can also see Gabriel daily at Song, Dust, Sing…Reverbia's popular singer/songwriter showcase and open mic.

description: Whether you’re just coming back from seeing Daft Punk at the trash fence, or fighting off a giant hot dog in the Thunderdome, or maybe you just wandered around all night with your girlfriend in deep playa riding unicorns and doing karaoke with the Man (OK, you miiiiiiiight have something stronger than a brunch cocktail for that one)… how do you end your night or start your day?  That’s right! It's baaaaaaack! How hot can you take it? Spicy, savory, and DEFINITELY alcoholic, join us for even more bacon, even bloodier marys, and some lovely bottoms for all to view (ask before you fondle!)! Bring your own cup to Camp GTFO (location TBD) for the best*, hottest*, and TASTIEST* bloody marys and goodies on the Playa! . (* dustiest; let's not kid ourselves.) There are usually other food goodies available, as we see fit and depending on how drunk we got the night before/that morning. We'll also have our famous Hydration Station for those who aren't drinking or for those under 21 (because they can all still eat BACON, right?! Shush, it's a rhetorical question.) . Also revisit the ARE YOU A BLOODY PUSSY OR WHAT? bar, and see how hot you can take it when Gemini pours whatever the hell she damn well feels like into a shot glass for you to drink. Want to earn YOUR red wings?! Have a seat in our living room, dance the morning away in Tiny Club, play on the trampoline (clothing optional, of course!), or write in the shared journal! Bring your ID, bring your friends, bring your family, and BRING YOUR OWN FREAKING CUP!
name: Gemini’s 3rd or 4th Annual Bacon & Bloody Marys!
print_description: Join Gemini for the return of bacon, bloody marys, & bottom biscuits! BYOC! Toast a great night or a good morning! Hot, spicy & full of (s)ass.
title: Gemini’s 3rd or 4th Annual Bacon & Bloody Marys!

description: Join us in creating a safe, non-sexual space for everyone to enjoy no-pressure platonic intimacy! Spooning, nuzzling, and all styles of cuddling will abound. Whether you want a creative new way to make some friends, are asexual and want to explore non-sexual intimacy, just need a sweet way to de-stress, or are simply chasing that lovely oxytocin buzz, come check it out! To facilitate creating this safe and non-sexual space, we ask that participants keep their pant[ie]s on and save the sexiness for our Thursday Sexploration Party at 9pm. This event is respect and consent oriented - ALWAYS ask before touching someone else in any way. As always, this party is a safe space for trans, genderqueer, and gender variant people, and any and all genders/orientations (or lack thereof) are welcome at this event.
name: Gender Blender’s Dusty Snuggles Cuddle Puddle
print_description: Join our all-gender NON-sexual cuddle party! Enjoy a platonic, gentle no-pressure atmosphere focused on intimacy and consent!

description:
We're offering an automated gift exchange service and a crowd-sourced kissing  booth that distributes gifts and kisses among a web of people. The person giving the gift/kiss is almost never the person the receiver exchanges their item with. 

Participants can come and list what they want or may have to gift/kiss. If a participant doesn't have something, we'll provide a gift of their choosing. Then using a trade-loop algorithm a web of exchanged items is created that pairs participants with gifts they want.  For those who only wish to give, we photograph them and give their item's recipient their photo/information to potentially interact with later. 

All exchanges/kisses are executed daily at noon. Please come before or after to browse/list or join in the chaos of the exchange!
name: Gift Exchange and Love-Triangle Bazaar
print_description: Want to make a gift economy work? Exchange gifts using a trade-loop algorithm with no hassling or haggling. No gift? No problem, we'll provide you one
title: Gift Exchange and Love-Triangle Bazaar

Inspiring interactive spiritual talks focus on Buddhism. With over 1 million worldwide subscribers, internationally acclaimed podcast host Jason Jarrett will lead a discussion on:

Whether a practicing Buddhist, or just spiritually, or intellectually curious, all are welcome.

description:
Small Camp Power Workshop
How to power your small camp (1 to 15 people). This information can also be applied for those emergency situations at home when you lose power for more than 8 hours or have an off the grid get-away place. The emphasis will be on:
- Minimal basic electricity for the neophyte,
- Determining your needs,
- Understanding your alternatives,
- Designing a power plan,
- Seeing what it takes to implement that plan and power your camp,
- And above all else SAFETY.
name: Godzilla Camp Presents: Small Camp Power Workshop
other_location: Godzilla Camp (formerly known as Sloth Camp)
print_description: Small Camp Power Workshop
title: Godzilla Camp Presents: Small Camp Power Workshop

Be a part of the 750 club!

description: Do you have Endo or know someone who does?  Join us for an Endo Support Group.  1 in 10 women have this horrible incurable disease which causes pain, infertility, scarring, and inflammation : You are not alone!  Come share your story, hugs, laughter, and tears.  We'll have books you may want to borrow and swag, too.  Wear yellow to support Endo Awareness!  Head to Horny Camp at Menagerie Village and ask for Prickly Pear (or look for horrible yellow leggings). See you there, EndoSisters.
name: Got Endometriosis?
print_description: Do you have Endo or know someone who does? You're not alone! Come share your story, hugs, laughter & tears. Wear yellow for Endo Awareness!
title: Got Endometriosis?

description:
The process is simple: a person gets up on the massage table and is surrounded by 3-5 "healers", who envelope the person in an energetic cocoon - it's a wonderful experience! A guide operate as a kind of "air traffic controller" during hands-on-healing sessions, while teaching the process to the others around the massage table. No previous experience is necessary...and you can learn the basic technique in about 30 minutes. Come join us if you need some help, would like to experience it, or would like to be part of the healing team :-)

We'll be repeating this event at:
- 2:00 pm on Tuesday
- 10:00 am on Wednesday
- 1:00 pm on Friday
- 12:00 pm on Sunday

Please help us in sharing and promoting this event :-)
name: Group Hands-On Energy Healing
print_description: Join us in an experiential exercise of channeling your energy, directed by your intention.  You can either receive or be part of the healing team :-)
title: Group Hands-On Energy Healing

description: Witchy women, nomadic mystics, and those forever transient: Follow the traveler’s road to discover a Gypsy Dance Party of astrological proportions!  See your future in the swirling dust while dancing to the sorcerous mash-ups (music with lyrics!) of DJ LobsterDust (Bootie, LA & NYC). Join our vagabond tribe as we drink to good health and curse those who have done us wrong with enchanting gin & gingers (our specialty cocktail) or experience the magic crystals (alcoholic snow cones).  Palms will be read, spells will be cast and destinies will be changed. Don’t miss it… because when the sun moves on, so do we.
name: Gypsy Mirrorball Sunset Dance Party
print_description: A Dance Party of prophetic proportions! See your future in the mystic mash-ups (music with lyrics!) of DJ LobsterDust. Palms read & spells cast!
title: Gypsy Mirrorball Sunset Dance Party

description:
Come join us in the Green Goddess Lounge on Wednesday morning, where we will offer fellow burners the opportunity to learn more about the benefits of probiotics foods, including how to make them for yourself at home!  All interested class participants will be able to receive a free “kombucha or water kefir starter kit” to use at home.
	Green Goddess resident Nutritionist, Jessica- will be talk about the benefits of incorporating probiotic foods and beverages (like those we serve) into your everyday diet, answer questions from fellow campers and share tips for making your own probiotics foods and drinks at home.
name: Happy Belly Class
print_description: Find out how to have a Happy Belly on Playa and all year long! Learn about the nutritional benefits of probiotic food & drinks, DIY recipes & more!
title: Happy Belly Class

description: Harness the Source Qigong:  Access the infinite field of create potential that pervades the entire Universe, underlies all creation and resides within you. Activate your innate healing abilities, ground into the present moment, and feel your connection to all of life.Nourish the flow of source energy inside of you. Integrate your mind, body and spirit into wholeness. Cultivate your natural state of health, vitality, awareness and compassion, with this gentle practice of movement, sound and visualization. The ancient art of Qigong, pronounced "Chee Gong", which translates as the "Cultivation of Life Energy", combines elements familiar to Yoga, Meditation, Reiki, Martial Arts and Quantum Physics to provide feelings of presence, peace, relaxation, connectedness and well-being. Give your human mechanism/energy body and "oil change", and charge yourself up for your next Playa adventure.

description: "Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart:  Guided Meditation and Ceremony"  In this journey, Colby will guide us into our inner sanctuary within and deep into the recesses of our heart space where the altar of wholeness resides.  Here we will be given the opportunity to accept our injustices, reclaim our disowned aspects, and renew our awareness and devotion to wholeness and love.  As the Light of Truth and Divine Love radiates from our hearts we will share in group and anchor in our bodies with physical relating exercises and dance.

print_description: Guided meditation to the altar of the heart to reclaim what has been disowned and to celebrate wholeness.
title: Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart

description:
The Health Division will be handing out pre-approved food permits at Playa Info from 1pm-2:30pm from Sat. Aug 29th - Thur. Sept 3rd, with extended hours on Sunday and Monday beginning at 11:30 am.
The Nevada State Health Division will be handing out food permits for those who have applied and been approved to serve food at the event. 
Food permits must be obtained and be in-hand before a camp may begin to operate their food service. 
We will hand out permits at Playa Info near Center Camp during the following times-
-Saturday, August 29th : 1pm - 2:30pm 
-Sunday, August 30th : 11:30am - 2:30pm
-Monday, August 31st : 11:30am - 2:30pm
-Tuesday, September 1st : 1pm - 2:30pm
-Wednesday, September 2nd : 1pm- 2:30pm
-Thursday, September 3rd : 1pm-2:30pm  

We will not accept food service applications at Burning Man or approve food service on-site. To be approved to serve food, you must apply to the State Health Division by August 16th, and receive approval prior to the event. For more information on how to apply visit, http://dpbh.nv.gov/Reg/Temp-E/dta/Forms/Temporary_Food_Establishments_at_Special_Events_-_Forms/ 

If you have questions or concerns about food service at Burning Man, contact the Health Division at 775-623-6588.
name: Health Division Hands Out Food Permits @Playa Info
print_description: The Health Div. will be handing out pre-approved food permits at Playa Info from 1pm-2:30pm from Sat. Aug 29th - Thur. Sept 3rd.
title: Health Division Hands Out Food Permits @Playa Info

description: Get your very own custom version of our now famous Heart body art. Why? Because "Everyone loves a Heart-On!" Choose from multiple colors of airbrush paint and stencil sizes, ink stamps, temporary tattoos, and of course those Welt-On!s done with our trusty heart riding crop - just the thing to fill all your HO desires! So, whether it's a cute lil' pink one or a huge purple one, our Fluffers will give you the Heart-On! you've always wanted, and they'll put it anywhere you like. Remember: "Your Heart-On! should last until you rub it out," and, "Multiple Heart-On!s are always fun," so sashay around BRC and wear your Heart-On! proudly!!

description: Paradise is a series of 26 poses. Most Yoga poses (asanas) are performed twice and held for a minute or 30 seconds. This creates natural heat in the body, the fire in the belly to create positive change, which allows the body to go deeper and safer into the poses. It eliminates the risk of injuries, promotes sweating and helps to release toxins. This class uses the same routine every time. Hot Yoga is a way to experience paradise on earth.
name: Heavenly Yoga - Paradise

description: The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki.  This performance was inspired by and arranged from the Japanese traditional tea ceremony. I named myself Hechi-Ken after the legendary master of tea ceremony, Hechi-Kan. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thought toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make better and more enjoyable future throughout this tea ceremony.
name: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
print_description: I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me.A great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy.
title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD

description:
Hobo Camp challenges you to keep your mind and eyes open as you wander about the playa, and play our "i-con game."  Take note of the curious markings known as "hobo signs" and come to Hobo Camp, located within Camp Conception. Correctly decipher 3 signs and you will be richly rewarded!

To cope with the uncertainties of hobo life, hobos developed a system of symbols, or a visual code. Hobos would write this code with chalk or coal to provide directions, information, and warnings to others in "the brotherhood". A symbol would indicate "turn right here", "beware of hostile railroad police", "dangerous dog", "food available here", and so on.
name: Hobo I-Con Game
print_description: We challenge you to decipher the hobo icons we place all around the playa.  Come to Hobo Camp with 3 deciphered icons and get rewarded!
title: Hobo I-Con Game

description:
Home Sweet Dome presents the Church of the 5th Element theme camp at 7:30 and Carny.

Join us all week for a variety of interactive events, including sunset cocktails, popcorn, chill house beats, an open bouldering wall, workshops, and nightly lighting of our 8 ft. in diameter steel globe fire pit.

The ELEMENTS

FIRE: we'll blaze up our 8 ft.-in-diameter steel globe fire pit so you can watch the world burn before you burn baby burn! Popcorn included.

EARTH: monkey around on our rock climbing wall 

WATER: home-crafted, artisan libations and cold brew

WIND: Home Sweet Dome resident DJ beats in the air

The FIFTH ELEMENT: That's you of course, bringing all the love. ♥ 

SCHEDULE OF EVENTS

Monday 8/31	: 
Workshop: The basics of healing and energy work at 1 pm
7:30 Sector Neighborhood Welcome Party at 5 pm

Tuesday 9/01:
Morning Cold Brew at 10 am
Workshop: Lucid Dreaming at 2 pm
Sunset cocktails and Watch the World Burn Firepit at 5 pm 
Bouldering , all day

Wednesday 9/02
Sunset cocktails and Watch the World Burn Firepit at 5 pm 
Bouldering , all day

Thursday, 9/03
Sunset cocktails and Watch the World Burn Firepit at 5 pm 
Workshop: Fireside yoga with Risha at dusk 
Bouldering , all day

Friday, 9/04
Home Sweet Dome Salon with musical performance by Eitch, meditation, story talk and chanting. Sunset.
Bouldering, all day

description:
Tuesday rolls around, and you know where to be found! Homojitoville Happy Hour of course, with those drinks and that SOUND?!  Duh! You think.  You thirsty fool! Make your way down the street, and come dance and be cool! Our lovable bartenders will treat you with a smile, and pull that penis tap to drain the Homojito river Nile!  Many have come before, and all have loved dearly, but with our new Catwalk and Genie Bottle, this Happy Hour’s ‘bout to make HISTORY!  Clearly…
AND SHOULD YOU FIND US OUT AND ABOUT, we're impossible to go without. Because amidst the dust and in from the blind, our caravan begins to arrive. Our color is FULL, and our energy BRIGHT! Thank heavens it’s the Homos coming into sight! We bring with us drink, the most refreshing to be found; A Homojito we call it, better than ANY around! Its succulent tartness with fresh pulled mint, you’re sure to enjoy each and every sip. Come with us and clown! We’ll be all around town! You'll see the fur coming while sweet music abounds!
name: Homojitoville Happy Hour
print_description: Come and guzzle bottomless icy-fresh Homojitos and dance to music WITH WORDS as we rock Tuesday away! Bring us your cup, and we’ll fill it with love!
title: Homojitoville Happy Hour

description:
Hotshot the Robot returns to celebrate the 10th anniversary of his 1st birthday. No singing, he hates that. Don't offer him a beer, he hates that too. 

Hotshot was born Friday during the 2004 burn near the 3:00 plaza.

It is with heavy heart he returns to the place of his birth after a nasty bout of losing himself in a search of fame and fortune. 

It was only after locking on to his self-reflection in a pool in the Hollywood hills, high on some kinda smack did he see what he had become. It was one of those infinity pools that seems like it falls away to the surrounding landscapes. They got really trendy in the middle to late 90's and this one in particular had really nice cultured stone placed to look completely natural almost...

A pool of robo-flection, falling away to nowhere...in this case it happened to be the gorgeous smog filled sky overlooking the 405 south and the 101. 

"What have I become?" he whispers to himself whispering back at himself.  
"Why am I wearing this amazing floral print burgundy kimono robe?" which was actually made for him personally by one of the finest seamstresses in the Sai Kung district of Hong Kong. 

He had been had by himself having been had. 

No more. It was time to get back to what mattered most in Hotshot's life. I mean after all, no skeezer in all of Orange County could tighten his nuts half as much as The Burn had in the past. Just because he doesn't have feelings, doesn't mean he doesn't have feelings. 

There is no shame in going.........home. 

Hotshot immediately logged onto his brand new Macbook Pro with the 13.3" HD Retina screen and made his first steps towards the playa and logged onto Stubhub and bought a ticket for $1175.00. After his friends said he couldn't fit his bean bag chair in their ride he went to ebay and purchased a car pass for $389 (free shipping) and folks the rest they say is history. 

Come say hello old friends and new friends alike. 3:00 plaza all week, only God knows when.
name: Hotshots 1st birthday 10th Anniversary Spectacular
print_description: Hotshot the Robot returns to celebrate the 10th anniversary of his 1st birthday. No singing, he hates that. Don't offer him beer, he hates that too
title: Hotshots 1st birthday 10th Anniversary Spectacular

Halcyon will share lessons and learnings from his grandpa, life, and the playa that will help recalibrate our hearts and realign our spirits 
Halcyon is a 17-year Burning Man participant and co-founder of Pink Heart Camp. He is the author of “Love more. Fear less.” and hosted the NBC.com web series “Fears. Regrets. Desires.” For over a decade he has hosted the Playa-inspired, Webby-award winning video podcast HugNation.com and frequently speaks about Gratitude & Gifting.
Halcyon is the co-founder of the San Diego-based “1st Saturdays” homeless outreach program and currently serves as Chief Wisdom Officer at a tech company in Ventura, California.
name: Hug Nation and Pink Ride- Halcyon
print_description: Halcyon will share lessons and learnings from his grandpa, life, and the playa that will help recalibrate our hearts and realign our spirits
title: Hug Nation and Pink Ride- Halcyon

description:
Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience.

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!

Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed.

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then sprayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along.

Hair washing may be available, depending on donated water resources and available PolyParadise members or other Playa friends willing to provide Hair Washing.
name: Human Carcass Wash
print_description:
Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience.
The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!

Music will consist of a variety of things that are not EDM, such as classic and alternative rock. Beer Pong is a possibility if our moop management plans pan out. Food will include your backyard staples- hotdogs, lamb skewers, corn on the cob, and various other items.

The bar will, of course, be open. We plan to have a keg to serve inexpensive beer (and also cut down on MOOP from cans.)

description:
A 90-minute workshop introducing Thai massage theory and techniques to anyone who would like to enjoy being able to offer their benefits to friends and family. No bodywork experience is required.

Thai Massage is an ancient bodywork practice which combines acupressure, energy meridian stimulation and yoga-like stretching. This is an Ayurvedic version of Shiatsu which encourages great relaxation and rejuvenation. The recipient, fully clothed on a floor mat, continues to remain passive, while gently and fluidly, yoga-influenced stretches are applied to them. There are many positive effects including stress-reduction, increased flexibility resulting in injury prevention, muscle spasm relief and the treatment of a wide variety of orthopedic complaints. This work is also a conscious, meditational application of Metta (love and compassion) that leaves both the giver and receiver with a life-affirming feeling of peace and connection.

Jennifer Gillmor is a Senior Practitioner at Thai Massage Toronto, a Holistic Table Massage Practitioner and a Yoga Teacher at Yogaspace in Toronto, Canada
name: Introduction to Thai Yoga Massage
print_description: A 90-minute workshop introducing Thai massage theory and techniques.
title: Introduction to Thai Yoga Massage

description:
There is no greater gift than fully seeing and honoring the people around us. 
How do we show up with full presence? How do we look, listen, and speak in a way that calls out the radiant beauty manifesting uniquely in every person we encounter? 

This workshop is a chance to learn simple tools to recognize and acknowledge the best qualities in ourselves, strangers, friends and loved ones. 
Come with open ears, open eyes, and an open heart. Leave with a smile, a glow, a new style of gifting and a way to elevate the default world to new levels of love.

Hosted and led by Sunyata & LoveBomb
name: 'I See You: the Art of Acknowledgment' Workshop
print_description: This workshop is a chance to learn simple tools to recognize and acknowledge the best qualities in ourselves, strangers, friends and loved ones.
title: 'I See You: the Art of Acknowledgment' Workshop

description:
Jamrunner is a "Journey to the End of the Night" styled game (ie: zombie tag, spy tag). 

Between evading pursuers, there is an interactive story that will unfold the longer a player remains in the game. The more resources I have available to me, the more enriched I can make this experience. I will need LOTS of printed materials, including maps and dossiers.

If you'd like to join (or know a person/camp who can help) let me know! See below for details.

The story:
Businessman and Nevada oligarch, Randall "Buck" Thurlough, is about to deal a deathblow to decommodification at Burning Man. The Order of Greywater Cockatoos is waging a subversive campaign against this corporate takeover. You are a member of this underground movement led by the elusive culture jammer, Darwin Sandiego.

Be careful! Thurlough's influence has grown to the point that he has successfully installed his own hired muscle at the festival. Private contractors of the notorious Pike River Security Firm roam the playa. If they catch you, they'll coerce you into turning on your fellow operatives.
name: Jamrunner
print_description: Jamrunner is a "Journey to the End of the Night" styled game (ie: zombie tag, spy tag). It starts at the Duckpond!
title: Jamrunner

description:
Oasis 47 is very fortunate to have a unique body worker and healer trained in the art of Karen Burmese healing.

Ron Hod is one of only 3 non-Karen practitioners of Karen Burmese healing techniques, and has been practicing for 14 years. The church leaders who once offered the training no longer do so, so further training can only be achieved in Thailand or Myanmar (Burma). Ron is initiated, attuned, and aligned in the Karen Burmese art of Opendove Form (/Open Dove Form) modicum, a system of energy and body work that dates back over 1,700 years. Ron was recently realigned to the specific energy specifications required of practitioners,
name: KAREN Burmese Massage and Intitutive Bodywork
print_description: A unique form of intuitive massage and bodywork originating from Burma which dates back 1700 years. Ron is one of 3 non-Karen people who can practice.
title: KAREN Burmese Massage and Intitutive Bodywork

description:
Come and enjoy a relaxing sunset time with us to share our authentic kava tasting experience! Replenish yourself before the night takes on.

KavAquatic will be serving kava from late afternoon to the first hours of the night as is traditionally done in the Pacific Islands of Vanuatu, New-Caledonia and Fiji, in a setting taking you right back to an island paradise!

As a tribute to the magic of the Pacific Island experience and goodwill, our campsite will be a dedicated and epically tranquil chill-out zone. Kavaquatic will be an island paradise perfect for individuals or groups to relax, recuperate and connect. Coupled with traditional kava beverages served at sundown each evening, our campsite will make for the perfect escape from the hot, dry, dusty desert, and one that even the most experienced burner will seek out at some stage. This oasis-in-the-desert experience will be complemented by our camp's guiding principles of inclusion, self expression and camaraderie.
name: Kava Tasting
print_description: Come and enjoy a relaxing sunset time with us to share our authentic kava tasting experience! Replenish yourself before the night takes on.
title: Kava Tasting

description:
KittyTrim is the Ultimate Female Hygiene Service for the woman who desires to feel totally pampered on the Playa. The service is for woman 18 year young and over, only!

If you have arrived on the Playa and feel you need a trim or desire to be smooth or even have a design done to show off, come by KittyTrim to have your wishes become reality. KittyTrim is the Ultimate Pampering Experience. The perfect place to get ready to enjoy the Carnival of Mirrors.

Sire BushWhacker was one of the first two people to ever offer this service on the Playa starting in 2002. After a period of a few years hiatus, the Sire has chosen this year to return to offer his exceptional service for the Wonderful Women of the Playa.

He does this shaving service using only electric and no bare blades. Those nicks from blades do not feel so great with Playa Dust. He uses 3 electric shavers and one of them is specifically designed to totally smooth those pubic hairs. A beautiful lady that does waxing came by for a KittyTrim one year, and her comment was that she felt this was the closest she had ever experienced to waxing.

Over the years Sire BushWhacker has had many recommendations by women to the point where for multiple years in a roll there was a 2 to 3 hour wait.

The Sire is limiting his time to 3 days only and only 4 hours per day: Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday from 12pm (noon) to 4pm.
 
He is also allowing you to sign up in advance via email (baymtns@yahoo.com) request to limit your wait time, so you may enjoy many of the other wonderful things on the Playa.
 
The times available are on every hour and half hour, so 12 or 12:30 or 1 or 1:30 etc.

Sire BushWhacker awaits to be of service to you, My Lady!
name: KITTY TRIM by SIRE BUSHWHACKER
other_location: Contraptionists Camp on the corner of 8 & B for a KittyTrim ask for Sire BushWhacker
print_description: KittyTrim is the Ultimate Female Hygiene Service for the woman who desires to feel totally pampered on the Playa. The service is for women 18 & over.
title: KITTY TRIM by SIRE BUSHWHACKER

description:
We'll have two classes explaining and demonstrating on how to throw a knife. Part of the explanation will be on why this is NOT a martial art and why, despite what you've seen in the movies, no one in their right mind would ever throw a knife at a person. It should be thought of as more of a form of object manipulation, like juggling.
  We'll have one knife throwing wall and a number of floor boards for familiarizing yourself with the weight and balance of the knives. We'll have knives for practice but feel free to bring your own. Classes are Tuesday and Thursday 10:00 - 12:00
name: Knife Throwing Class
print_description: Knife Throwing Class & Practice. Two classes Tues & Thur at Gigsville explaining and demonstrating knife throwing. Maximum audience participation.
title: Knife Throwing Class

description:
Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed!

Tuesday through Saturday from Noon until 5:00pm Black Rock City citizens can jump on the "K" (subway) Train with its outrageous ads and colorful graffiti to arrive at the platform of Koney Island’s best kostumery – the closed down mysterious K Station.  Kamp Karneys assist folks as they morph themselves with over TWO TONS of costumes. Exit through the gift shop onto the runway where burners strut their newfound finery rebirthed onto the playa - ready to participate with extra attitude. From the raised dance platform watch the daily fashion shows and ongoing esplanade carnival. Loved by the paparazzi and Cheered on by subway straphangers, live DJ music, and the infamous ring master MCs, citizens can show their freaky side on the runway under the watchful eye of the 25' tall King Kong. Hanging from the Empire State Building, even Kong gets his freakshow on with his Guinness World Record 45' pink tutu (Tutu Tuesday) and BRC Animal Control bling.
name: Kostume Gifting Experience
print_description: Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed.
title: Kostume Gifting Experience

description: Do you want to try something completely new? We’re all looking for ways to have experiences that really rock our world and awaken our senses! Here’s your chance to experience something we guarantee you’ve never felt before! Eros Tangeré is a one-on-one “tactile performance” that can only be described as a sensation experience that is created as your very body is played as if it were an ever changing organic musical instrument.  Your body becomes the surface upon which amazing erotic sensations will cascade with the undulations of an amazing music track and scent. Imagine that you can FEEL the expression of music with your body. Shed of your clothes, you lay prone and robbed of your sense of sight, one of our artists will perform upon your body with the music in ways that you have never experienced. This is a unique and creative custom designed sensory performance. Not for the faint of heart. Eros Tangeré is a one on one, sensual adult event. Space is very limited so signing up for a session prior to start time is highly recommended. Check in at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures inside Spanky’s Wine Bar for more info and times. 18+, Ladies Only. This has become a hit-favorite at Burning Man, do not miss it. Appointments are limited.
name: Ladies: Eros Tangeré Erotic 1-on-1 Sensation
other_location: Inside Spanky's Wine Bar, Camp of Sensual Pleasures
print_description: 1on1 tactile performance experience. Your body is the instrument for erotic sensation, private and amazing session! 18+ Female. Come early!
title: Ladies: Eros Tangeré Erotic 1-on-1 Sensation

description:
Last Bar on Earth or First bar on Play, depending on which way you reach the trash fence. Located along the fence, like a mirage looming in the distance, out of the desert, from the dust: Ice Cold Margaritas. The Last Bar on Earth, past the Esplanade, past the Man, past the Temple… as far as a person can go in Black Rock City.
…or…
The First Bar on the Playa; depending on which way you are coming to the bar. For those trekking across the barren wasteland, evading the dozen or so security and law enforcement agencies, avoiding detection by radar and heat sensors, struggling to finally reach the perimeter fence; our Bar is there to offer you an ice cold beverage and welcome you Home with a hug, brother/sister, before contacting the proper authorities and turning you over to security.

For several years I have rode my bicycle with trailer out to the furthest point in Black Rock City with all the booze, juice, water, soda and ice I could fit in the 3 large ice-chests. I purposely set up at the remotest spot I can find, away from camps, sound systems, art vehicles and crowds.  Trying to provide a service to intrepid playa explorers, people out riding bikes along the trash fence, those reaching beyond the EDM to see the desert vastness. As they spot our stack of coolers along the fence, in they trickle and find Iced Cold Margaritas waiting for them. Every year we go through every drop of beverage we can carry out there, usually in under an hour or two. Hosted by Camp Threat.

Bring a cup and witty banter. Join us at the fence.

And, YES, most definitely, Daft Punk will be playing.
name: Last Bar on Earth/First Bar on Playa
print_description: Last Bar or First, depending on which way you reach the trash fence, our mobile bar will be there to quench your thirst with ice cold beverages
title: Last Bar on Earth/First Bar on Playa

description:
Laugha Yoga is an ancient yet
new idea of combining the practices of yoga,  prolonged intentional
laughter and Radical Forgiveness. This combination is extremely potent
and effective. This dynamic practice energizes, enlivens and brings us
greater confidence. Laughing Yoga has many health benefits among which
are a boost in our immunity and lowering stress levels. Forgiveness is
an ability we can develop to renew our relationship with our self and
others. Laughter is a by-product of the joy and heightened sense of
interconnectedness.
name: Laughter Yoga
print_description: Laugha Yoga is an ancient yet new idea of combining the practices of yoga,  prolonged intentional laughter and Radical Forgiveness.
title: Laughter Yoga

description: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
name: Laughter Yoga
print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of a good, long laugh!
title: Laughter Yoga

description: The threat of nuclear war, the next extinction level event, climate change and economic enslavement, all point to the unsustainability of our current trajectory. With all of humanity's advances, why can't we achieve peace and prosperity for all? The underlying cause of our failure might be gender inequity:  women are our most underutilized natural resource. Past societies which overcame war and poverty were governed similarly to ours, with one difference-- the existence of a fourth branch, consisting of post-menopausal women only. Following this historical precedent, how can we restore women's voice in government? And, can we do it in time?
name: Lecture:  OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE
print_description: The underlying cause of our failure to achieve peace/prosperity for all might be gender inequity:  women are our most underutilized natural resource.
title: Lecture:  OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE

However, not every prize is so great, oh yes there are zonks out there so choose wisely and listen to your fellow citizens shouting from the audience because they may think they know something that you don’t. description:
Join us for our annual LiBEEdo block party, we're stoked to make it bigger, badder and even more ridiculous than ever before! We will be serving our infamous LiBeedo cocktails (mojitos with honey) along with several badass DJs dropping tasty beats for us to get our Buzz on! Our new sound system will blow your stinger off and there will be a dance-off so bee prepared! Wear black and yellow to bee VIB (Very Important BEE!), you'll definitely want to join our hive for the day! 

Drinks & dancing start at 2:00 PM, then we are off to Swarm to Man at 6:00 PM, where we will buzz unsuspecting burners and delight them with the sweetness of our spicy stingers! Last year we had more than 100 bees on the swarm, this year will be sure to be even larger! Come make history!

Wear your black & yellow & join us if for the party you won't want to miss!
name: LiBEEdo Party and Swarm of the Man
print_description: Our annual LiBEEdo party and Swarm of the Man! Dancing and drinks at 2pm, leaving camp to SWARM the Man at 6pm. Wear black and yellow!

description:
IMAGINEnation is a camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty.
Our coaches provide daily life coaching workshops and one-on-one coaching to the people of the playa. We are offering 30 minute sessions, Monday thru Saturday 12-4pm to help you sort out your life.
Whether it's finding a job you love, fixing your relationship, losing 30 pounds or simply being ready for the next exciting chapter in life, the work you will do with your coach will provide immediate inspiration, serious results and lasting knowledge.

Our Life Coaches have been through a rigorous training process and utilize The Handel Method, which is also the foundation of the work we teach at MIT, NYU and Stanford.

Together we dig deep, play big and don’t stop until goals are fulfilled and lessons learned. We care, we love what we do and we walk our talk.
name: Life Coaching
print_description: IMAGINEnation is a camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. We are offering 30 minute sessions coaching sessions!
title: Life Coaching

description:
" An introduction to human energetic system and how the ancient mystical traditions of India, China, and Europe interweave to create the foundational elements for an integral spiritual practice - the control of the human vessel through postures (asana) + breath control (pranayama)  + mental focus (mantra). Includes 2-hour physical practice of Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn.

There will be an explanation of Traditional Indian Medicine (Yoga/Ayurveda) and Traditional Chinese Medicine (Qi Gong/Taoism), two ancient healing systems over 2000 years old. There will be an exploration on the difference between the Indian Hinduism (Polytheistic) & Chinese Taoism (Monotheistic) theories and how we can integrate these two philosophies into our daily spiritual practice to empower ourselves.

The discussion will then be followed by a 2 hour Yoga & Qi Gong class which will blend together the elements of ancient India (Yoga) and China (Qi Gong) to provide a dynamic moving meditation focused on providing a balance of both Yang (active) and Yin (passive) elements, that will conclude with a healing Yoga Nidra (conscious deep sleep) meditation - leaving you empowered, focused, and energized - ready for the burn and the new year. "
name: Life-Force Dynamic: An Exploration of Human Energy
print_description: An introduction to human energetic system using Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn (bring a yoga mat or towel) with Matthew Winke.
title: Life-Force Dynamic: An Exploration of Human Energy

description:
Joey Chang aka CelloJoe is the world's only beatboxing, long distance bicycling, looping cellist.  He is the wildest beatboxing cellist in the west. By combining cello with beatboxing, he has created a unique genre: Classical Hip Hop. 

CelloJoe records live on stage with a loop pedal and produces intricate tapestries of harmony, melody, and rhythm. His beatboxing (vocal percussion) and funky cello grooves form a rich soundscape for intelligent lyrics and his music spreads love, joy, laughter and conscious vibrations.
name: Live Music with Cello Joe!
print_description: Cello Joe performs with a loop pedal and produces intricate tapestries of harmony, melody, and rhythm, with beatboxing & funky cello grooves. Yay!
title: Live Music with Cello Joe!

description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world.  See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .
name: Longevity Stick
print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, clothes optional. 1 hr of lo impact exercise for balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We’ll provide the sticks!
title: Longevity Stick

description: Buzzinn to the dHive bar and delight in humankind’s original ambrosia!  Mead is the oldest alcoholic beverage known to man & we aim to share with you how easy it is to make at home. A honey based wine, mead requires a very small investment on your part. The variations of style are endless as you can make mead with fruit, ciders, herbs, different kinds of honey, dry or sweet, (i.e. has remaining sugar),  bubbly, (like sparkling wine), or still. We will explain how to make it, where to get it, and even have demo equipment available. 21+ and over can sample different varieties we've made and brought to share. You will come away with an understanding of:   Early Discoveries of Mead,  Mead in Religion and Culture, & the Techniques of Making Mead: -Overall concepts that mixing water, honey and yeast starts a reaction to convert the sugars in the honey to alcohol and release carbon dioxide gas. -The equipment needed such as a 1, 3 or 5 gallon water bottles, airlocks, tubes to siphon off the mead from the ‘lees,’ (sediment at the bottom of the fermentation container), bottles, and a few other items such as cleanser to keep everything clean. -Selections of honey to make mead and how the type of honey influences the end result flavor and the same for yeast selection. -Selections of ‘adjuncts’ which influence the flavor of your mead: the addition of spices such as cloves or cinnamon (known as metheglin), or the addition of fruits such as raspberries or strawberry (melomel).  We will finish up with tasting different styles! Bzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!
name: Mead Workshop @ the BuzzInn
print_description: Get your Buzz-On @ the BuzzInn & learn the homemade mead (honey wine) making process & what you need to ferment your own.  Sample Cyser & Melomels.
title: Mead Workshop @ the BuzzInn
