description:
Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. 


Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems with Aussie Karaoke.


We will be throwing bangas on the barbie until sundown. You’d have to be mad as a cut snake to miss the official Aussie meet up on playa!
name: Straya Day
print_description:
Join us for an Aussie themed BBQ party with food, drinks & games from down under.

It's the official playa meet up for Aussies but all are welcome!
title: Straya Day

description:
Enjoy group conversation and participation while talking about emotional intimacy, boundaries, listening, and how to express your sexual desires and fantasies to your partner without fear.
Prize wheel spin off after class!

As you enter the schoolhouse, make sure to stop and get a class time snack 	
and some refreshing H2O to fuel your mind and body. 
Each attendee will also receive a souvenir that will be used to help us randomly pick lucky class attendees to spin the prize wheel. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a great prize! Class participation is strongly encouraged. The School is a judgment free zone where everybody is welcome!

description:
It's a DRUM CIRCLE Revival hosted by Camp STEEP!
Join us at 7:00PM in front of the Temple on Wednesday for Drumming, Dancing, Howling, and TEA!
We aim to restore and revive those Tribal Roots by drumming up the heart and soul of Black Rock City! Wear your white, bring your drum, your dancing feet, a stool, your cup (for tea!) and your sunset howl!
We will drum the sun down, howl as he slips behind the mountain ridge, drum and drink tea until its dark and then disperse into the night!
We look forward to meeting you there!

-Camp STEEP

Camp STEEP is located at 7:45 and Ersatz (and this event is at the Temple, not our camp, just to be clear!)
Stop by M-Sa 12-4pm (and whenever else we feel like it) for a hot, iced, creamed or straight cup of customized herbal tea for your hangover, hydration and heart! Drink in the love!
name: Sunset Temple Drum Circle
print_description: Bring your Drum, a stool/chair, your Dancing' Feet, a cup (for tea) and all that SOUL! Its a Sunset Drum Circle Revival in front of the Temple!
title: Sunset Temple Drum Circle

description:
Friday 4 September at 1 PM
Come join us for the Daylight Burn of the Sun Tower

Bring a mirror of any size & dark sunglasses or goggles.

Just before burn time, we will be handing out some additional mirrors. When the word is given, the citizens of Black Rock City will use their mirrors to reflect sunlight at the center of the sun mandala at the top of the tower to try to start a fire in the cannon fuse placed there that will then set the rest of the tower ablaze.

It’s going to be BRIGHT! 
Bring Dark Sun Glasses

description:
Welcome to Swap Meat!

This event is organized by The Trustable Sluts: a community of sexually liberated socially responsible women.

This is a mixer for sexually liberated, socially responsible women* and the men and women (and everyone in between) who love them.

With Swap Meat, we turn traditional gender dynamics on their head and invite both men and women who want to date, relate and have sexual connections with women who identify as women* who are self-aware, sex-positive, love warriors.

WHO ARE WE: trustablesluts.com

There will be little structure and much fun. We will bring something to identify the "meat" and identify Trustable Slut Members.

# 1 rule of SWAP Meat is
you bring someone AWESOME
to SWAP Meat.

We want to be introduced to more amazing people who want to meet fun, playful, and open women, who are in alignment with our values.

Bring someone who you would recommend to date your best friend. Bring someone who is "available" to date. Bring someone who has good boundaries and knows how to communicate. Bring someone who YOU are 100% okay with sharing.

Who NOT to bring:
-Some random person off the playa
-Someone who is overly eager to hook-up (aka desperate).
-Someone who isn't emotionally available or at least self-aware.

Official Meat Policy:

1) Meat can be of any gender.
2) We encourage "available" meat. That word has many interpretations...it is whatever it means to you. However, here are some ways it means to us:
+ is single or in an open relationship.
+ their relationship agreements allow for dating.
+ has time to date, meaning not just interested in hooking-up.
+ has experience in our or some other community of sexy tribe.
+ has emotional intelligence and communication skills.

*NOTE: We are open to all gender orientations and sexual orientations. We are LGBTQ friendly.
name: Swap Meat! with the Trustable Sluts
print_description: The Trustable Sluts host a sex positive dating meet-up. Come have a drink and meet some lovely people. Maybe you'll get your meat swapped.
title: Swap Meat! with the Trustable Sluts

description:
Seeking answers to the riddle of your own identity in your reflection?  Is it really you? Or are you looking at a vision? To find out, grab a partner, put on a mask (or take yours off), grab a plunger, get a vodka drink!

description: Come dance with us!  Argentine Tango is a vibrant dance that came from the salons of Buenos Aires.  Stalk around the floor in a partnership, be elegant, precise, and passionate - and hopefully walk out of the class carrying some of that with you into your everyday life.  Our world class teachers will get you started, and you can bring your newfound dance skills to our evening parties!

print_description: Argentine Tango is a vibrant dance that came from the salons of Buenos Aires. World class teachers will get you moving beautifully.

description: The AUM (Awareness Understanding Meditation) Workshop is based on the understanding that in order to find its silence, the western mind first needs to express its tension and stress.The aim of the AUM Meditation is to consciously transform stress and negative emotions into positive creative energy, and to create personal well being and peace through a social process of Awareness, Understanding and Meditation.It is divided in twelve stages that allows you to experience all shades of your emotional life ‚Äì anger, love, sadness, laughter ‚Äì and to express these emotions in a protected and safe environment.Once emotional awareness and intelligence are mastered, it becomes easier to express emotions in a healthy way, resulting in more effective communication skills and a greater sense of personal empowerment. The fear of expressing all our feelings diminishes, freeing us to make a genuine choices about how we act. Unspoken positive and negative feelings can create blocks in our relationships with friends, colleagues and loved ones.Through experiencing the AUM, relating becomes clearer, more honest and more fun. the AUM also allows you to reclaim to joy of simply being alive.Bring a pillow or cushion
name: Tantric AUM
print_description: A high energy social meditation that allows you to express the full rainbow of emotions AND taste the deep awareness that holds it all of it
title: Tantric AUM

description: This is a space to see, feel, smell, touch the divine in ourselves and others. Choose to embody the masculine or feminine for this play and bring a partner of the opposite polarity just to balance the numbers - you have the choice to "see the one in the many" if you decided to move around partners to experience "seeing the One in the Many" or to stay with the same partner and go deeper into "seeing the Many in the One" - this will be a puja style ceremony unfolding deeper layers of intimacy.
name: Tantric Puja
print_description: Discovering deeper intimacy, love and awareness in this Tantric ceremony. Choose to meet many partners or remaining with one love partner.
title: Tantric Puja

Together with Lithuanian pancakes Burners will be asked to try other traditional Lithuanian snacks: fried bread or cucumbers with honey. Fresh cucumbers and honey are the best refreshment during hot afternoon at the Playa.

description:
“Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.” ~ Lewis Carroll (1871)  “Through the Looking Glass, and What Alice Found There” 

To peer “Through the Looking Glass” is to seek alternative perspectives, to imaginatively approach a traditional problem or line of reasoning in order to illuminate impossible solutions. This often requires a willful transformation of ourselves — a creative shape-shifting — so that we see the world with new eyes, new senses, a new consciousness. It is only in this way that a new world reveals itself — as strange, yes, but perhaps also closer to world in which we dream.

In 2015, TEDx BlackRockCity will be an opportunity to open and reflect ourselves in new ways, to a new world, in which we are all transformed by ideas that matter.
name: TEDxBlackRockCity
print_description: "Through the Looking Glass" - Lewis Carroll (1871) - TEDxBRC features Ideas Worth Spreading while celebrating our 5th year of this important program.
title: TEDxBlackRockCity

description: Come to Black Rock Observatory to view the universe through our giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite. Using a precision parabolic mirror, we’ll show you space and time. Photons are travelling billions of miles at light speed through space just to meet you at the Observatory, will you be there to meet them? Get the big picture in the Macro Dome or see inner space in the Micro Dome. See Saturn’s rings, craters on the Moon and deep-sky wonders live with your own eyes after Sunset every night. Science talks, exhibits and special events happening all week.
name: Telescope Viewing
print_description: View the universe through a giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite.  See Saturn’s rings or craters on the Moon live!
title: Telescope Viewing

description:
What do you see when you look in the mirror? What do you desire? What do you loathe? Take it all in...exhale, and again….What do you SEE when you look in the mirror?
 
A cascade of images, music and performance awaits as we gaze outward from the Esplanade and inward to our soul. Join members of the Vau de Vire Society, Bad Unkl Sista and Dustfish for a performance fusion evening like no other: ritual, fire, physical theater, circus all woven together. You don’t want to miss this show. Starts promptly at 8pm! Bring a small mirror.
name: Tell-tale Reflections
print_description: What do you see when you look in the mirror? Vau de Vire Society, Bad Unkl Sista and Dustfish join for a performance fusion evening like no other.
title: Tell-tale Reflections

description:
Camp Videogasm will again be host to The Black Rock City edition of The 48 Hour Film Project. Were groups of burners write, shoot and edit films over a 48 hour period while at Burning Man to be shown at Videogasm on Thursday night (9/3) at 11pm. We'll start with a retrospective of short films produced at Burning Man in previous years and then premiere the videos that will be produced at this year's Burning Man!

Filmmakers: If you have a team and equipment, start at your leisure and follow the instructions on posters found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm (in Snowflake Village). If you're looking to form a team come to Videogasm at 3pm on Tuesday (9/1) to meet up with other like minded individuals.
name: The 48 Hour Film Project: Black Rock City 2015
print_description: Make a short film at Burning Man following the rules found on our posters at Playa Info, and we'll show it on our two large screens on Thursday night!
title: The 48 Hour Film Project: Black Rock City 2015

description:
Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.
Glimmer began her coaching experience as a HR Rep at Cisco Systems, Inc. She has now found a natural extension of her passion in supporting individuals with articulating their ideal life and creating a plan to achieve it. Through this work, Glimmer assists people in bridging the gap between their current existence and their dream life.

In addition to holding a BS in Psychology, Glimmer is earning her coaching certification through the QSCA. Through this year long program, her focus has been Law of Attraction and Light Body work.

Glimer sees her special talents as the ability to extract visions out of her clients and get them on paper where they can be evaluated and converted into working life plans and guides for daily decision-making.

print_description: Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.

“I want a girl with extensions in her hair, Bamboo earrings, at least two pair.
A Fendi bag and a bad attitude, that's all I need to get me in a good mood

description:
Remember the most majestic tree you have ever experienced?

Did you have enough time to celebrate it? To dream with it?

Majestic trees give living form to the most diverse places on Earth. When they disappear, unseen, the world flattens. These trees are becoming rare. And valuable.

The Canopy Tribe helps others to sleep in majestic trees. To have time to dream – and radically self express.

Three-minute crash courses in tree hunting, tree climbing, tree campouts, tree house building and tree circus.

Acrobats, architects, artists, arborists, tree huggers welcome.
name: The Canopy Tribe: Sleep in Temple Trees
print_description: Majestic trees are living mansions of the forest, pillars of evolution. Learn how to climb, sleep, build, dream, and radically self-express in them.
title: The Canopy Tribe: Sleep in Temple Trees

description: Come all ye playa dappers, dames and ragamuffins and indulge in our beloved Quebecois spring ritual: the sugaring-off party. The Dusty Beavers will recreate the jovial, old-time Cabane à Sucre (Sugar Shack) tradition on the Playa. Maple syrup will be boiled to amber-hued perfection, drizzled on snow (crafted in secrecy, but with love), then artistically twirled into a sticky sweet gem-like glob. Don your dustiest glad rags to chill out in our maple-icious speakeasy and indulge your sweet tooth with nature’s sweetest sap. No beaver pelt trade expected or required in return. description:
"Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled.

Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone.  For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see."
name: The Four Faces Of Incorruptible Personal Power
print_description: Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining you
title: The Four Faces Of Incorruptible Personal Power

description: The sounds and performances of The Galactic Effect blend many different realms and styles into one stellar glue. He will be performing dancy, future bass, music with glitch hop elements, live electric violin, and some vocals. His sound crafting technique incorporates vibrant synthesizers and future bass with orchestral vibes, strings, and other world elements. Arranging music which defies all barriers, genre’s and labels, creating in constant change and movement, leaving the audience curious for the next possibility plucked out of the infinite spectrum of the auditory universe.
name: The Galactic Effect
print_description: Bringing in a cinematic twist to Electronic music.
title: The Galactic Effect

description:
LIke most carnival games, the risk is part of the fun.. This is a game with a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.  Is it ever really simple?  “The Game” requires a high degree of interactivity among all those involved, even those walking by may become drawn into the action and be participants. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries.  Choices where there were once obstacles.  “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and American's Got talent.. 
“The Game” is perfect for letting that INNER freak come out. Watch what happens when permission is given to the darker, more playful side of one's self. That part that stays just out of sight, watching from the sideline, wanting to take part, but doesn't due to social constraint or peer reprisal.
“The Game” is both a game of chance and boundaries.  Winning is all a matter of perspective. Everyone wins with the upside of personal insight, everyone loses what may have been a self-limiting perspective.  A new episode with each draw is guaranteed to amaze and astound!
name: The Game!
print_description: Created for the 2013 burn, this is a game, played at the bar, has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.
title: The Game!

description: In the story of Hanuman (the mighty monkey deity of Hinduism) is a being with numerous gifts, and a faulty memory. On his path, he connects with others who remind him of his magical abilities. We are indeed mirrors for each other, with opportunity to reflect as the embodied unique contribution and how to bring more love and gratitude in the world. The Monkey Tantra is an experimental application of this idea, connecting together via loving human contact, vocalizing, visualizing, and inhabiting fearless graces through movement play and voice. Elements of dance, yoga, breath, chanting, and more combing to engage the body as a complete sensory organism. A sensory body is alert, animated, and alive. It resonated safety, security, and competence. It is ready for anything! This is an investigation, an exploration, a collaboration, a seriously FUN limitation-busting experiential living as we are - as ONE.
name: The Monkey Tantra - an interactive fun mix of voic
print_description: In the story of Hanuman (the mighty monkey deity of Hinduism) is a being with numerous gifts, and a faulty memory. On his path, he connects with other
title: The Monkey Tantra - an interactive fun mix of voic

description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private.  Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator.  When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience.  Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want.  No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options.  We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave.  We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun.  Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience.  Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense.  If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.
name: The Orgasamator Experience
other_location: Located in Spanky's Village and Wine Bar at 4:00 and Carny
print_description: The Orgasamator gives intense physical pleasure in a setting that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private. Exit refreshed & smiling. Female18+ only.
title: The Orgasamator Experience

What I've discovered thru practicing this very simple paradigm has rooted me far more deeply than I'd ever dug, to the taproot of our collective Source.  We'll do some simple exercises together that will shift your relationship with the World in deeply powerful ways, generating more and more synchronistic synergies around you.

description:
Saturday, Day of the Burn, 5:30 - 7:00 PM

In Black Rock City there is much to see, always, in the way of art-- buildings and structures, Art Cars and installations... but there's another kind of art to see, as it strolls around the Playa...
It's the often unique way each of us dress (or undress) for the event!
And each year, there's one gathering place where Playa Fashions shine their brightest.
That's the Big Stage in Center Camp Café. The day is Saturday, and the time right before the Burn, starting around 5:30 PM.
The PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW, a tradition since 1987, is the place to see and be seen, as the amazing creations worn on the Playa have their moment before our audience on our Runway.
Join your hosts, Dr. Howland Owll and DJ Justin Credible, as we present this year's highlights of YOUR Incendiary Couture!
Fantastic outfits, puppets, body decoration or just one's signature Playa clothing-- anything and anyone may appear. Models assemble backstage.
Come and watch... or even better, be a part of it!
name: THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe
print_description:
THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe
Saturday, Day of the Burn, 5:30 - 7:00 PM
title: THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe

description: In the lead up to the burn we'll be collecting names and addresses of folks who would like to receive a postcard from the playa. Then once we're out in the dust we'll be recruiting random passersby to write a message on those pre-addressed postcards. Once you've written a postcard to a random you'll be able to fill your own address in (or a friend's) so that someone can write you a postcard! Feel free to get in touch with us to submit your info or just come find us on playa.
name: The Randomized Postcard Project
print_description: Send a postcard to someone completely random and leave your address so someone completely random can send you one too!
title: The Randomized Postcard Project

description:
Join Flirt Camp for our 1st Annual Sexy 'Red Party'. 

Grab your creative red outfit and come dance, flirt, play and enjoy a special cocktail on the last night at Flirt Camp 2015.  

We have excellent music, beautiful people and a sweet Bar-&-Lounge. 

Something you won't want to miss is our EPIC flash mob dance by the Sky Dancers. It's amazing.  ;)

This party is designed to travel!  We will walk out to the Man Burn together and for our "4th Annual Hot Dog Cookout", where we will grill hot dogs while we watch the greatest pyrotechnic show on earth!  The MAN BURN!

We will continue with the Red Party after the MAN BURN and play more excellent music.  Look out for the red LED light balloons strand.
name: The Red Party

title: The Red Party

description:
Come be reborn into the world of the Playa.  Confess your sins, then spin the Wheel of Penance!  This will indicate what you must do, as detailed in the Book of Penance - though you will be able to choose a G, R or NC-17 rated version.  Once completed, you will have been cleansed of all your sins and can be reborn anew.  You'll then rid yourself of all your worldly belongings (take your clothes off), and from within our dome with a pair of legs - you'll crawl out through a 6' vagina, where someone in hospital scrubs will spank you and give you a rebirth certificate - onto which you'll put your thumbprint and Playa name before we laminate it.
This will be our 5th year on the Playa since 2000.

print_description: Come be reborn into the world of the Playa.  Confess your sins, spin the Wheel of Penance then be reborn through the 6' vagina.

description: The United Nations, for all its good, it not enough.  We need a new, more representative global meeting ground for those seeking to replace our current civilization with something better. In 2016, delegations of current and future leaders from every nation on Earth will gather together for a week to develop a set of common principles for a politically and environmentally sustainable society in the 21st Century. Come learn more from Jim Clark, the founder of the World Congress for a New Civilization. description:
While carnival boardwalks and midways are perfumed with the smell of Coney dogs, and funnel cakes, and dotted with souvenir shops, we transform the people into the attractions for others to enjoy.  There is a juxtaposition of who receives the excitement and who gives the excitement with an ample supply of tighty-whitey under pants in various styles.  The inner artists can express their creativity and dusty taints through colored markers then don the one-of-a-kind art. Snap a picture (instant camera on site) for our “Taint Wall of Freaks” then take your art on a traveling show - the living canvas of “the self”.
Monday/Tuesday – Foreplay! To get one excited and invigorated.  “Manifest it Monday”, “Free for all Tuesday”. You call it; it’s yours, especially our bartenders.  Monday and Tuesday are the days we establish our regulars!  We play “The Game” until we just can’t stand it anymore (In a good way of course).  It’s all about introducing ourselves to our neighbors and making friends for the week, friends for a lifetime.
name: Tighty- Whitey Take-Out
print_description: Watch as people become mobile art, visual masterpieces! Using underwear as a canvas, manifest your creativity with colored markers. Wear away!
title: Tighty- Whitey Take-Out

description: Rugby is a rough game, but it's not only for buff dudes – just no touchy-feely please, even though it's a touch rugby we'll play. Join us if you please! Why naked? For a great bonding experience, plus it's hot on the playa... and your costume would be destroyed in the game otherwise! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) Come to the playa around 7:30 Portal and look out for bouncing balls!

description:
There are many things you 'could' do, but there's nothing you 'should' do. I suspect there's no such thing as a 'should'. A should is a 'could' with shame smuggled on top of it. Come explore shame and its cousins: guilt, envy, anger and jealousy. All these emotions have one thing in common, they usually hide their tracks and are hard to admit. Learn to transcend your shame with cutting edge subjective tools. We'll investigate the nature of shame & shaming, look at the adaptive advantages of them and how they serve & do not serve our development.

Join love coach Annie Lalla for some powerful exercises that will help you move beyond past shames and show you how desist from laying down new ones. This is a forum to discuss how to experience our emotions, especially the difficult ones, so they stop haunting your psyche.  You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.
name: Transcending Shame, Guilt & Envy
print_description: Learn to transcend these often hidden emotions using cutting edge tools from Annie Lalla. You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.
title: Transcending Shame, Guilt & Envy

Along with a great cup of tea we are a space for transformational conversation; we might also have some other fun things going on to keep you entertained while you steep and sip. description: San Francisco’s infamous electroswing/burlesque party returns to the playa for a feverish full-throttle freakeasy of highfalutin fulsomeness and low-down dirty deco bass. Doll up and dance to the haunting hoopla of the West Coast’s premier electroswing pioneers: DELACHAUX, THE KLOWN and The GENTLEMEN CALLERS of LOS ANGELES. And indulge in hypnotic undulations with international burlesque sensations TOSCA RIVOLA, IDA FOCHT, KITTY OAKS, VIOLET D’VINE, IVIZIA DAKINI, TANA THE TATTOOED LADY, BRITTANY WALSH, and those fabled fiends and floozies FOU FOU HA! Plus ferocious Femcee MISS EMMMA! This joint WILL jump. Equal parts Weimar cabaret and wild speakeasy rave, Trapeze lures a bevy of underworld flappers, vipers, vamps and villains to a bass-fueled night of jazz age abandon. The jungle drums are getting louder…

description:
There is power in making a choice to be present. To witness. To be witnessed. A choice to see and be seen as we are and in our highest self

When we gather with intention, we gather and increase in said powers. This will be such a gathering...

...and in such times and at such gatherings true magic, transformation, renewal and clarity through spaciousness are even more possible, even more accessible, for that tribal heart intention is an almost irresistible force for ourselves individually and collectively. 

This heart centered gathering is a simple but profound Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing and being seen first in silence, then with witnessing, listening and sharing, so that we may open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves either directly or through the eyes of another. 

I invite you to be vulnerable. To see and be seen in this moment. To open to the beautiful reflections in each other. 

Come to this gathering because you are READY to step up into your full expression. Ready to be the Strong Man and a Powerful Woman who has the right to be met, and the right to love and be loved.
name: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja
print_description: Tantra Heart Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing & being seen. Open to the possibility of falling in love with yourself through the eyes of another.
title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja

description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!
name: Tribal Tantra Medicine Dance
print_description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!
title: Tribal Tantra Medicine Dance

description:
We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. 

By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. 

Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within.

From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.
name: Tribal Tantra w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave

description: The art piece of the band U2 will be moved to the burn foot print of the man for a memorial burning on Sunday September 6th at 12 noon.  Our team will have food and beverages for all,  please come and bring a friend to honor the loss of the bands tour manager Dennis Sheehan.  Drummer Larry Mullin JRs father passed away this year also.  Last year Bono had a bike wreck in NYC and sufferd many injurys and is unable to play the guitar on this years tour,  lead guitarist "The Edge" fell off the stage in Canada this year and was hurt also.  The burning of the art piece will lift the bad luck the band has had to endure and also honor the memories of those who have pass away.   We are going to produce a video of the event for the U2 nation to share in the event on youtube.  Thank you,  Viper.
name: U2 Batterd And Brused Tour Of Sadness MemorialBurn

description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
name: Up Your Game with Sexy Skills!
print_description: Navigating New Sexy Connections: From “Fuck Yes!” To “Oh No!” and all those "Maybes" In Between! Held in the Chakralicious Camp Temple Dome.
title: Up Your Game with Sexy Skills!

description: Take a deep breath in. Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures both high and low, fast and slow, light and dark. Come find your voice, your rhythm and your dance through vigorous movements, grounding stillness and heart opening chanting. Guided meditation and breath work weaved in and out of this movement we call vinyasa yoga will open doors to parts of your body and mind unknown and will create a little more space both physically and subtly. Come take the leap, the ever graceful rise and fall and ascension into the sky. Come sweat it out and get ready for all the night has to offer.
name: Vinyasa Flow
print_description: Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures.
title: Vinyasa Flow

description: We will be going through a series of poses that will move you through the power of inhaling and exhaling. Vinyasa movements are smoothly flowing and almost dance-like, with synchronized breath and movements. Vinyasa has both mental and physical benefits. Physically, sweat expels toxins and re-energizes your body and can be an easy to challenging physical workout, mostly depending on you and where you take your practice. Mentally, the synchronized breathing relaxes your mind and helps to release any blockage of energy flow throughout your body.

description: Experience the creation and renewal of vows at the Temple of Promise!  The Temple Guardians would like you to come share your joy with us as we host a ceremony for those who wish to commit and promise themselves, either newly or renewing, at the Temple of Promise.  The ceremony will be just in time for sunset on Thursday September 3rd.  We’ll have a ceremony with live music, a welcome group message, individual and/or group vows, exchange of rings, an embrace (plenty of photo opportunities!), and a closing.  Don’t forget a meaningful gift that you can exchange with other participants who stood next to you during this ceremony.  Participate or come to celebrate with others, it’s open to all.

print_description: Come to the Temple of Promise for a vow-promise renewal ceremony.  Bring your personal vows and a gift to exchange with others who participate.

description: We Are Evolution:  How does evolution function as the sure intelligence of life?  How are you, as a human being, a key part of shaping the future?  Why are people (and our unique, yet not special, souls) particularly important to the patterns of biological and consciousness evolution in our Galaxy at this time?  Join High Priestess and Regenerative Design Expert, Samantha Sweetwater for this interactive playshop where you will learn how to surf the integral & biological mechanisms of evolution.  Find and amplify your unique place and point of leverage in the soul ecology of Life.  Uplevel your present sense of purpose.  And, together with all others present, discover how to co-cause the future we want.
name: We Are Evolution with Samantha Beers
print_description: We Are Evolution:  Surf the integral & biological mechanisms of evolution. Uplevel your present life.  Discover how to co-cause the future we WANT.
title: We Are Evolution with Samantha Beers

description: Have you ever noticed that BM is not really a safe space for everyone? Have you ever felt like you are being treated like a freak because of your gender identity? Are you over people asking why your body looks the way it does? Are you interested in creating real safe spaces for people whether they fit in the binary or not? Are you troubled by cultural appropriation on playa and the way some folks are treated as other or freaks in a way that doesn't feel good? Then this workshop is for you. This workshop is also for you if you want to delve into the intersections of race, gender, class and how these identities affect our experience at BM and beyond. Many of us come to playa to be free and our full liberated selves yet when we pass through the gate we have not dropped our baggage of racism, transphobia, sexism, abelism, and classism at the gate.  So let's be real and talk about how these isms affect our time on playa and off and what we want to do to create the world we want to live in. This workshop will be interactive, engaging, fun, and educational. Let's define what we want the word freakshow to me and let's reclaim ourselves and whole people who all deserve respect.
name: We are Not Your Freak Show
print_description: Are you curious how to create a safe and inclusive space for people of all backgrounds? Come, learn, explore, and share
title: We are Not Your Freak Show

description:
To put it very simply; when someone is being a Weather Reporter, it is as if they have no control over the circumstances that exist, it just is the way it is because of influences out of their control. Being an Author is looking at things as the creator and being responsible for outcomes. 

This is especially valuable in a group like this where people are counted on to produce serious results, as the conversation is about clearing away self-limiting thoughts and replacing them with positive and proactive ones. However, this isn’t a one-time cheerleading session, but rather an introduction to a simple yet revolutionary way of thinking about things that people can take with them. Each person will begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which 
to run their professional and personal life.
name: Weather Reporter vs. The Author
print_description: Learn to be the master of your circumstances.
title: Weather Reporter vs. The Author

description:
Burners, you’ve made it. Whether this is your first time or tenth time, the journey Home is not without its challenges.

We at the Groove Oasis invite you to come catch a rest at our Hookah Haven lounge, get a refreshment at our Watering Whole, and shake the rust off on our Dusty Dancefloor.

Our resident DJ’s will be providing the finest selection of Open house music to welcome you back to the expanse of the desert.
Come breathe with us, drink with us, laugh with us, and move with us. Our house is your house.

description: Just like light, sound, or ocean waves, a dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. These patterns continuously repeat themselves in a wave of motion. The 5Rhythms are: FLOWING – the fluid, continuous, grounded glide of our own movements; STACCATO – the percussive, pulsing beat that shapes us a thousand different ways; CHAOS – the rhythm of letting go, releasing into the catalytic wildness of our dance that can never be planned or repeated; LYRICAL – the rhythm of trance, where the weight of self-consciousness dissolves, where we lighten up and disappear into our own uniqueness; and STILLNESS – the quiet emptiness, where gentle movements rise and fall, start and end, in a field of silence. Please join Marcia Dancing Heart for an introduction to the 5Rhythms at RhythmWave.
name: What are those 5Rhythms anyway? w/Marcia
print_description: A dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. Please join Marcia Dancing Heart for an introduction to the 5Rhythms.
title: What are those 5Rhythms anyway? w/Marcia

description: Festivals have been with us since man and woman started to gather, but there's been a big uptick in global festival attendance in the 21st century. The more digital we get, the more ritual we need. Chip Conley will explore why festivals are making such a comeback and how festivals are a foundational part of humanizing society and creating more cultural curiosity.

description: Art Cars were so 2014, this year ShangriLa is bringing ART BARS to the Playa. The new ShangriLaLa Weinkeller will bring a little bit of the Orient and a whole lot of whimsy to the Playa with its painstaking design details and solid recycled wood construction. Camp members are asked to dress in formal attire. Throw in a little flogging with a cat-o-nine tails and it will be a night to remember. Please dress in your formal wear for this evening. Bring a bottle of your favorite wine and wine glass as well. In Vino Veritas - in Wine lies the truth. There are four (4) recognized stages to wine tastings: Appearance, The Aroma of the Wine, Sensations of the Mouth and The Finish (aftertaste). Please make sure you have your ID ready - you have to be twenty-one (21) years old to drink @ ShangriLaLa. We will check your ID - Namaste.
name: Wine Tasting @ ShangriLaLa
print_description: The new ShangriLaLa Weinkeller will bring a little bit of the Orient and a whole lot of whimsy to the Playa. Please bring a bottle of wine to share...
title: Wine Tasting @ ShangriLaLa

description:
We are all connected to the same Source of all life, but as individuals, the experience of contact with inner guidance and spiritual beings will be different for everyone. Whether we consider these forms of intelligence to be higher aspects of our own selves or independent entities, the challenge is the same: how do we access and validate this wisdom? Our spiritual guides communicate with us through intuition, and we only need to refine our ability to receive. Craig will teach his unique methods, which include powerful ways of opening up one’s awareness to the realm of divine guidance. You will learn to trust the, information you receive, to control and direct your psychic energy and to explore new ways of creative problem solving.

For more info, see:
www.higherselfdiscovery.com
name: Working with Spirit Guides
print_description: Craig Junjulas will lead an experiential shamanic workshop on spirit guides, raising your energy & helping you to connect with your personal guides.
title: Working with Spirit Guides

description: Senior Earth Guardian and Leave No Trace Master Educator Mike Bilbo will discuss the history of burn scars on the playa, Leave No Trace solutions, and Burning Man's stewardship through large scale solutions known as burn platforms. description:
We are exploring an exhibition / fun event in the temple on Thursday for a wrestling event Indian Style (East Indian called Kushti). But any kind of wrestling in an inflated rubber tub filled with mud. Wrestlers are welcome to wear a traditional wrap, speedo, shorts or ...nothing.

This is for fun and not to be taken too seriously. An official and first aide person will be present. Participants can be any gender and an audience will surround the tub and are encouraged to bring playa gifts for the winners. Reward your warriors.

WANT TO PARTICIPATE? Stay engaged here on this event. If you want to camp with Sun Guardians follow the links in the about section. We are exploring the idea and encouraging people to come join in on the fun as a participant!

Audience or Wrestler... come have fun and tell us what you think.
name: Wrestling Exhibition in honor of Hanuman
print_description: We are exploring an exhibition / fun event in the temple on Thursday for a wrestling event Indian Style (East Indian called Kushti).

description:
Come One, Come All, Come Party with/like a Superstar.  Our Signature drinks are Vodka Lemonade (no promises its cold) or White trash Mimosas, and we hardly stop there...  Our Bartenders are on Vacay too so they can be nice or they can be snarky! Sometimes drinks are gifted, sometimes they are bartered; but never sold!!! So leave your $$ in your tent, and bring something fun to tip your bartender!!!   We do not operate on any schedule, so the rule of thumb is: If the barstools are down, we are most likely serving drinks, or at least attitude...
Some of our games include: Pool, fooseball, teather ball, shuffleboard, and...

description:
The Zendo is a community outreach project at Burning Man that offers education and psychological support, with the goal to help reduce the potential harms involved in drug use. Volunteers provide peer-to-peer harm reduction support for individuals having a difficult drug-related experience and who don't require medical care. Guests are sometimes actively on substance, and other times are seeking integration support, or education about the risks involved in drug use. We staff the space 24/7 with trained mental health and medical professionals who provide oversight, as well as individuals experienced in crisis response.

If you'd like to come to the training to learn more about volunteering, it will take place at Something Freaky This Way Foams, near 2:00&G, on Tuesday September 1 at 11AM. 

The four principles of psychedelic harm reduction include: 

1. Create a safe space - If someone is having a challenging experience try to move them into a comfortable, warm, and calm environment. If possible, try to avoid noisy or crowded spaces. Ask what would make them most comfortable. Offer blankets and water. 

2. Sitting, not guiding - Be a calm presence of acceptance, compassion, and caring. Promote feelings of trust and security. Let the person's unfolding experience be the guide. Don't try to get ahead of their process. Explore distressing issues if they want, but know that simply being with the person is supportive and talking may not be helpful.

3. Talk through, not down - Invite the person to explore what's happening and encourage them to try not to resist it. Remind them that they are safe. 

4. Difficult is not the same as bad - challenging experiences can wind up being our most valuable and lead to learning and growth. Help the person integrate the experience, and remind them the experience will continue to unfold.
name: Zendo Project
print_description: Feeling out of sorts? Visit Zendo where you'll find a calm space and volunteers who are available 24/7 to help with difficult psychedelic experiences.
title: Zendo Project

description:
FRI morning at 7 AM ~ Ayla will sing in the heart to greet the dawning sun, on the back of the dragon. (At The BALL in deep playa.)   

With an array of loop-pedals by her side, she builds layer upon layer of vocal melodies into fierce, sweeping harmonies and weaves syncopated threads of guitar, kalimba, piano, and percussion into each live performance.  

Her lucid storytelling and lyrical imagery are water for the thirsty soul; words and sounds that crack open the heart, and embody the many folds of our own selves. 
Crafting an immersive soundscape we can dive into, Ayla’s performance becomes a journey: an inspired, wondrous experience that holds you by the heart and doesn’t let go. 
   
|| www.aylanereo.com || www.facebook.com/ayla.nereo.music || wwwsoundcloud.com/ayla-nereo
name: Ayla Nereo sunrise set ~ Abraxas @ THE BALL
print_description: FRI morning at 7 AM ~ Ayla will sing in the heart to greet the dawning sun, on the back of the dragon. At THE BALL in deep playa.
title: Ayla Nereo sunrise set ~ Abraxas @ THE BALL

description:
Biodanza has been baring hearts since the 60's. Developed in S. America it is now a world wide phenomenon bringing joy, pleasure, balance, health and healing through music, dance and sincere interaction. Contact and caress are tools of our trade. We deal in deep human intimacy, through touch, eye contact, movement and body language. Not verbal communication. We feel each other, letting the mind and its ways take a back seat for a change. We enhance our senses, our instincts and our state of consciousness. We perceive and experience ourselves and others differently when we do this. More authentically. More naked. 
The first hour is for interactive activation and expression, maybe getting a little wild together. The second half is for slowing down, relaxing, melting and harmoniously merging with one another, exercising the polarities of enhanced sense of self to oceanic experience.
name: Biodanza:  From Instinct to Inspiration
print_description: Interactive dance-movement-contact workshop to stimulate residual potentials in vitality-creativity-sexuality-universal love.  With Niraj
title: Biodanza:  From Instinct to Inspiration

description:
Biodanza has been baring hearts since the 60's. Developed in S. America it is now a world wide phenomenon bringing joy, pleasure, balance, health and healing through music, dance and sincere interaction. Contact and caress are tools of our trade. We deal in deep human intimacy, through touch, eye contact, movement and body language. Not verbal communication. We feel each other, letting the mind and its ways take a back seat for a change. We enhance our senses, our instincts and our state of consciousness. We perceive and experience ourselves and others differently when we do this. More authentically. More naked. 
The first hour is for interactive activation and expression, maybe getting a little wild together. The second half is for slowing down, relaxing, melting and harmoniously merging with one another, exercising the polarities of enhanced sense of self to oceanic experience.
name: Biodanza:  The Embodiment of Pleasure
print_description: Interactive dance-movement-contact workshop to stimulate residual potentials in vitality-creativity-sexuality-universal love.  With Niraj
title: Biodanza:  The Embodiment of Pleasure

description: Begin with grounding and group exercises. Talk about body image and shaming. How do we experience this in the default world. How or is this different at burning man. Explaining that even compliments in this workshop must be consensual. Leading into 3-6 pods (based on numbers). Within the pods we take turns undressing each person.  This is like the Museum of Burningman Bodies. Within each pod we each have 2-3 minutes to tell our museum visitors about our body. Depending on group vibe and any time left, viewers may ask questions of the exhibit, or  request something they would like to be uplifted upon. The next person presents. This workshop will be tested this coming week at a regional burn. I‚Äôve started something without structure before at a workshop intensive of 18 people. Great experience. **90-120 min window ** will test out this weekend
name: Body Gallery
print_description: Bare your body in a safe pace as we navigate feelings around body image and body shaming. Participation: comfort around nudity.
title: Body Gallery

description: Circuscape is an interactive circus of the senses. Come lose yourself in one or all of our activities. In Mindscape, you'll participate in sensory illusions that will make you doubt what is real. In Moonscape, you'll be transported onto an alien world as you traverse our low-gravity obstacle course. In Spiritscape, you'll take inventory of your soul's baggage lighten your emotional load.
name: Circuscape
print_description: Circuscape is an interactive circus of the senses. Come lose yourself in our mind bending, body stretching, emotion unburdening activities!
title: Circuscape

description: The Cocoon is sheer, stretchy enclosure made of colorful spandex and a zipper. From the outside, the Cocoon embodies architecture as a live, morphing sculpture, based on the forces of the body. From the inside, the Cocoon is a blank slate, out of which you have the freedom to create and stylize your experience. In order to go through great transformations, we must let our out-of-date stories die so a new paradigm can be born. In this workshop we will re-enact that experience of death and re-birth, emerging through a "birth canal" with the support and assistance of the group to guide us towards a transformed self.
name: Cocoona Matata: Guided movement ritual
print_description: Re-wire for more positivity! Using props to fortify the body-mind-spirit flow, shed your old skin and see a worry-free butterfly emerge
title: Cocoona Matata: Guided movement ritual

description: Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future. The process works by subconsciously shifting your decision making over the next 10 years eventually making your vision a reality. You don't know what that day looks like? Don't worry, most people don't, but your subconscious already knows what is important to it. The more amazing and compelling the vision that you let emerge, the more you will be drawn to it. How? Most people make between 80 to 400 decisions a day. A rich, compelling visualization with a lot of sensory "hooks" can shift those decisions towards your perfect future because the right choices will feel "right". We will start with a mindfulness of breath meditation, a gratitude exercise and then wake up the morning of your perfect day and explore it through a guided process. After, we will ask a few of those interested to share their visualization with the group. We look forward to sharing your future day together. Dr.Feelgood
name: Creative Visualization: Picture your future
print_description: Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future.
title: Creative Visualization: Picture your future

description: From the opening moments, we learn this solo show is about soul mates, and the search for love and lust. Emily is the hero of the story, a character very much a literary stand-in for author and performer Eleanor O’Brien. We meet her as a child, fascinated by romance novels and her father’s porn. The show traces her journey from awkward teen to college boyfriends, complete with disappointing first times and disastrous blowjobs. But then she discovers renown sex-columnist Dan Savage, her ‘gay fairy godfather’. Dan helps her learn to ask for what she wants (“I can touch my own clit during sex?”), and encourages her to be GGG (Good, Giving and Game). Emily goes on a spree of experimentation, culminating in the “grand prix of getting lucky,” Burning Man. At the world’s largest alternative event, she meets Matt, who turns out to be the love of her life-but he doesn’t identify as monogamous. Can they make it work? Emily asks Dan for advice as they navigate the thrills and valleys of opening the relationship: how to negotiate boundaries, deal with jealousy and keep from falling in love with other people. She thinks if they follow the rules they've set, they can keep their relationship safe. They can be “monogamish,” and keep the spark in their marriage. When a magical threesome drives her to utter meltdown, Emily insists on closing their marriage. But monogamy doesn’t solve all their problems. Emily and Matt discover they have different libidos - and the seven-year itch isn’t a myth. He encourages her to spread her wings, so she takes a lover. All's fine for a while, but soon she finds herself falling in love with Michael, her NSA partner for play. She is terrified of losing her marriage to Matt, and asks Dan again for advice. “Is polyamory a utopian ideal?” During an ayahuasca ceremony, Emily finally sees where she's been blind to how her behavior has stifled her marriage, and how she has to let go of the need for certainty, or controlling anyone else’s heart.
name: Lust & Marriage: A Woman's Journey into Polyamory
print_description: This one woman play by Eleanor O'Brien of Dance Naked Prod. received critical acclaim at this year's Canadian Fringe Festival. 75 minute running time
title: Lust & Marriage: A Woman's Journey into Polyamory

description: As humans, we have our physical bodies and our energetic bodies. It’s pretty easy to know when you are holding hands with another person - but what about when you are energetically entangled? Burning man is the perfect place to explore Energetic Hygiene. In this interactive workshop we will play with different techniques for becoming aware of your field, clearing it, and expanding & containing it. Becoming aware of your energetic field and knowing how to use it is one of the most empowering things you can do for yourself - and it’s fun!

description:
The Back Alley Cinema (located appropriately enough behind the Black Rock City Self Service Abortion Clinic) has been providing literally dozens of burners with nightly entertainment, intermittently, since 2009.  Now a part of the Cult of the Magic Lady!

Come plop yourself down on a couch... or on a fellow burner... or on a fellow burner ON a couch..  Enjoy fresh popped corn in the middle of nowhere.  Programming varies but, with a library of terabytes of entertainment onhand, is bound to be... entertaining to someone.  Bring a friend!  Or two!  Maybe even three, but let's not overdo it, we usually don't have THAT much room.

Everyone has to grow tired of nonstop raving now and again (I think... Do you?  Honestly, I wouldn't know... Never really was my thing...  Which is why I run a theater... in a desert..  Oh crap, I think I may have gotten off track...) so take a night off and JOIN US...

Free intoxicants for the kids!  (No, not really... I'm actually just amazed at how many characters I'm allowed to type in this section...  Really.  I've only just passed the halfway point.  Isn't that nuts?  How are you to be expected to come up with so much to say, really...?)

Previous nights have included: Dude Night (Tron, The Fisher King, The Big Lebowski), Musical Night (Repo: The Musical, Tommy, Suck)... Some nights we don't even HAVE themes!  (Because, you know... Burning Man...  Plans vaporize!)

So be sure to visit us at some point in your travels.  You can also get yourself loaded at the Koi Lounge, and of course HAVE AN ABORTION... Or two... Or three! (You slut, but we don't do shame because.... What's the point?)
name: Nightly "Celluloid" Debauchery - Back Alley Cinema
print_description:
"Live people ignore the strange and unusual..."  Why be like them?
Nightly double/triple features of cult/oddities/what-have-you... MOVIES! POPCORN!
title: Nightly "Celluloid" Debauchery - Back Alley Cinema
